sentences.english: Please note that pets are not allowed in this establishment.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，本场所不允许携带宠物。

sentences.english: There is a sign that reads 'Pets not allowed' at the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 入口处有一块写着'禁止宠物入内'的牌子。

detailed_translations.english: a rule or sign indicating that animals are not permitted in a particular place

sentences.english: You should take property insurance to protect your belongings.
sentences.chinese: 你应该购买财产保险来保护你的财物。

sentences.english: Many businesses take property insurance to safeguard their assets.
sentences.chinese: 许多企业购买财产保险来保护他们的资产。

detailed_translations.english: to acquire or obtain something, often by payment

sentences.english: The power blackout left the city in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 停电使整个城市陷入黑暗。

sentences.english: Due to the storm, there was a temporary blackout in the area.
sentences.chinese: 由于暴风雨，该地区暂时停电。

sentences.english: The company implemented a blackout policy to prevent insider trading.
sentences.chinese: 公司实施了黑市政策以防止内幕交易。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time during which electricity is not available
the suppression or stopping of the publication or availability of information
a planned interruption of a performance or broadcast

sentences.english: Lifeguards are trained to deal with emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 救生员接受过应对紧急情况的训练。

sentences.english: (= In case of emergency ), press the alarm button.
sentences.chinese: 遇到紧急情况，请按报警按钮。

sentences.english: The plane had to make an emergency landing.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机不得不紧急着陆。

sentences.english: The government called an emergency meeting to discuss the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府召开了紧急会议，讨论这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧急情况， 突发事件
detailed_translations.english: an unexpected and dangerous situation that must be dealt with immediately

sentences.english: The fire gate was closed to prevent smoke from entering the building.
sentences.chinese: 消防门关闭以防止烟雾进入建筑物。

sentences.english: Emergency services used the fire gate to gain access to the fire scene.
sentences.chinese: 应急服务人员使用消防门进入火灾现场。

detailed_translations.english: a gate or door designed to prevent the spread of fire

sentences.english: The elevator can lift heavy objects.
sentences.chinese: 电梯可以提升重物。

sentences.english: She lifted the box with ease.
sentences.chinese: 她轻松地举起了箱子。

sentences.english: The team lifted the spirits of the fans.
sentences.chinese: 球队鼓舞了球迷的士气。

detailed_translations.english: to raise something to a higher position
a mechanical device for transporting passengers or goods in an enclosed cabin vertically

sentences.english: I take the elevator to the top floor to have a better view.
sentences.chinese: 我乘电梯到顶层以获得更好的视野。

sentences.english: The elevator stopped between floors, and we had to wait for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 电梯在楼层之间停止了，我们不得不等了很长时间。

sentences.english: Please press the button for your floor when getting into the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 进入电梯时请按下您的楼层按钮。

detailed_translations.english: a large machine that takes people or goods up and down between floors of a building

sentences.english: We found old photographs and antiques in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 我们在阁楼里发现了旧照片和古董。

sentences.english: The attic was full of dusty boxes and forgotten items.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼里堆满了满是灰尘的箱子和被遗忘的物品。

detailed_translations.english: the room at the top of a house, usually above the main roof

sentences.english: We booked a twin room for the two of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们预订了一个双人房。

sentences.english: The twin room has two separate beds.
sentences.chinese: 双人房有两张分开的床。

detailed_translations.english: a room with two beds, typically for two people

sentences.english: I set up a new stereo system in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 我在客厅里设置了一个新的音响系统。

sentences.english: The stereo system provides high-quality sound for our music collection.
sentences.chinese: 这个音响系统为我们收藏的音乐提供了高质量的音效。

sentences.english: We need to upgrade our stereo system to improve the audio experience.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要升级我们的音响系统以提高音频体验。

detailed_translations.english: a system of loudspeakers and usually a record player or radio set for high-quality sound reproduction

sentences.english: We need to replace the old water heater in the house.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要更换家里的旧热水器。

sentences.english: The water heater stopped working, so we don't have hot water.
sentences.chinese: 热水器坏了，所以我们没有热水了。

sentences.english: Make sure to turn off the water heater before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 离开前确保关闭热水器。

detailed_translations.english: a device that heats water for domestic use

sentences.english: She uses a vacuum cleaner to clean the floor every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天用吸尘器打扫地板。

sentences.english: This vacuum cleaner is very powerful and can handle pet hair easily.
sentences.chinese: 这款吸尘器非常强力，可以轻松处理宠物毛发。

detailed_translations.english: a machine used to clean dust and dirt from floors and carpets

sentences.english: I need to buy a new coffee maker because the old one broke.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一个新的咖啡机，因为旧的那个坏了。

sentences.english: She made a delicious cup of coffee using her automatic coffee maker.
sentences.chinese: 她用她的自动咖啡机制作了一杯美味的咖啡。

sentences.english: The office has a large coffee maker for everyone to use.
sentences.chinese: 办公室有一台大咖啡机供大家使用。

detailed_translations.english: a machine used for brewing coffee

sentences.english: I need to buy a new refrigerator because the old one stopped working.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一台新的冰箱，因为旧的坏了。

sentences.english: Please put the leftovers in the refrigerator to keep them fresh.
sentences.chinese: 请把剩菜放在冰箱里以保持新鲜。

sentences.english: The refrigerator in the kitchen is very old and energy inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里的冰箱非常旧，而且耗能。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

sentences.english: I need to put the leftovers in the fridge before they go bad.
sentences.chinese: 我需要把剩菜放在冰箱里，以免变质。

sentences.english: Could you please close the fridge door? It's getting cold in here.
sentences.chinese: 你能请关上冰箱门吗？这里越来越冷了。

sentences.english: The fridge is full of fresh vegetables and fruits.
sentences.chinese: 冰箱里装满了新鲜蔬菜和水果。

detailed_translations.english: an appliance for storing food at low temperatures

sentences.english: We need to buy some new bed linen for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要买一些新的床单来迎接夏天。

sentences.english: The hotel provides complimentary bed linen.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店提供免费的床单。

detailed_translations.english: bed covers, sheets, and pillowcases used on a bed

sentences.english: We are looking for a real estate agency to help us sell our house.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一家房地产中介帮助我们卖房子。

sentences.english: The real estate agency helped us find an apartment in the city center.
sentences.chinese: 房地产中介帮助我们找到了市中心的一套公寓。

sentences.english: Many real estate agencies offer virtual tours of properties these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今，许多房地产中介提供房产的虚拟游览。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房地产中介； 房地产公司
detailed_translations.english: a business that helps people buy or sell houses and other properties

sentences.english: We are looking for a property agency that specializes in luxury homes.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一家专门经营豪华住宅的房产中介公司。

sentences.english: The property agency helped us find our dream house in record time.
sentences.chinese: 这家房产中介公司在创纪录的时间内帮助我们找到了梦想中的房子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房产中介公司；物业代理
detailed_translations.english: a company or person that helps people to buy or sell property

sentences.english: The landlord agreed to fix the leaky roof at no extra cost.
sentences.chinese: 房东同意免费修理漏水的屋顶。

sentences.english: She was a fair landlord who always respected her tenants' privacy.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位公平的房东，总是尊重租户的隐私。

sentences.english: The landlord demanded that the tenants vacate the property by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 房东要求租户在本月底前搬离房产。

detailed_translations.english: a person who owns a house or apartment and lets it to people to live in

sentences.english: The landlady asked if we needed any more blankets.
sentences.chinese: 房东问我们是否需要更多的毯子。

sentences.english: We have lived with our landlady for over ten years.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经和我们的房东住了十多年了。

sentences.english: The landlady is very strict about noise after 11 PM.
sentences.chinese: 房东对晚上11点后的噪音非常严格。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who owns or rents out rooms or houses to people

sentences.english: The car is on lease for the next three years.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车租赁期三年。

sentences.english: They decided to put their new apartment on lease.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定将新公寓出租。

detailed_translations.english: to use something for a period of time by paying rent or a similar amount

sentences.english: This beautiful apartment is available for rent in the city center.
sentences.chinese: 这套美丽的公寓位于市中心，可供出租。

sentences.english: The house is for rent with modern amenities and a spacious garden.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子配有现代化的便利设施和宽敞的花园，现出租。

sentences.english: We are looking for reliable tenants to rent our office space.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找可靠的租户来租赁我们的办公空间。

detailed_translations.english: available for rent; for lease

sentences.english: The female deposits her eggs directly into the water.
sentences.chinese: 雌性把卵直接产在水中。

detailed_translations.english: to put something down in a particular place

detailed_translations.chinese: 存款； 保证金， 押金； 沉积物
detailed_translations.english: money that you pay when you rent something such as an apartment or car, which will be given back if you do not damage it

name: utilities
trans: 水电煤气等公共设施费

sentences.english: We need to ensure that all utilities are functioning properly before the guests arrive.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要确保在客人到达之前所有的公共事业设施都能正常运行。

sentences.english: The monthly bill includes various utilities such as electricity, water, and gas.
sentences.chinese: 每月账单包括各种公共事业费用，如电力、水和燃气。

sentences.english: The hotel provides free utilities for all its guests.
sentences.chinese: 酒店为所有客人提供免费的公共事业服务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公共事业；公共服务设施
detailed_translations.english: services such as electricity, water, gas, and sewage disposal

sentences.english: The incoming phone line is free right now.
sentences.chinese: 当前的来电线路是免费的。

sentences.english: You can make a call without any charge since the incoming line is free.
sentences.chinese: 由于来电线路是免费的，您可以免费通话。

detailed_translations.english: coming in; arriving
a phone call or telephone service

sentences.english: The noisy crowd made it difficult to hear the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 喧闹的人群让听不清演讲者说话。

sentences.english: The noisy children were playing in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 吵闹的孩子们在后院玩耍。

detailed_translations.english: making a lot of noise

sentences.english: Tokyo is extremely humid in mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏的东京十分潮湿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 湿的， 潮湿的， 湿润的， 多潮气的
detailed_translations.english: if the weather is humid, you feel uncomfortable because the air is very wet and usually hot

sentences.english: I need to do the laundry room today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天需要打扫洗衣房。

sentences.english: The laundry room is located on the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣房位于二楼。

sentences.english: Please keep the laundry room clean and organized.
sentences.chinese: 请保持洗衣房干净整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room in a house where clothes are washed and dried

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

sentences.english: We use an electric cooker to prepare meals efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用电炊具高效地准备餐食。

sentences.english: The electric cooker has a timer function for automatic cooking.
sentences.chinese: 电炊具有定时功能，可以自动烹饪。

detailed_translations.english: a cooking appliance that uses electricity to heat food

sentences.english: We need to replace the old gas cooker in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要更换厨房里的旧燃气灶。

sentences.english: Be careful when lighting the gas cooker.
sentences.chinese: 点火时要注意安全。

detailed_translations.english: a cooking appliance that uses gas

sentences.english: The cooker hood effectively extracts grease and odors from the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 炊具罩有效地从厨房中提取油脂和异味。

sentences.english: Make sure the cooker hood is properly installed and maintained for optimal performance.
sentences.chinese: 确保炊具罩正确安装并维护，以获得最佳性能。

detailed_translations.english: a device fitted above a cooker to remove smoke, fumes, and grease

sentences.english: I used a cassette recorder to record the interview.
sentences.chinese: 我使用磁带录音机录下了采访。

sentences.english: The cassette recorder stopped working after a few years.
sentences.chinese: 这台磁带录音机用了几年后就不工作了。

detailed_translations.english: a device for recording and playing sound on magnetic tape

sentences.english: We gathered around the fire place on a cold evening.
sentences.chinese: 在一个寒冷的夜晚，我们在壁炉旁聚在一起。

sentences.english: The fire place in the living room was cozy.
sentences.chinese: 客厅里的壁炉很温馨。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a room where a fire can be made

sentences.english: I turned on the electric heater to warm up the cold room.
sentences.chinese: 我打开了电暖器来暖和一下这个寒冷的房间。

sentences.english: The electric heater is very useful during the winter months.
sentences.chinese: 电暖器在冬季月份非常有用。

detailed_translations.english: a device that produces heat to warm a room or area

sentences.english: I need to work in pleasant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

detailed_translations.english: the objects, buildings, natural things etc that are around a person or thing at a particular time

sentences.english: Many people prefer to live in rural areas for a quiet lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 许多人更喜欢住在农村地区，以享受宁静的生活方式。

sentences.english: Rural areas often have a strong sense of community.
sentences.chinese: 农村地区通常具有很强的社区意识。

sentences.english: The economy of rural areas is often based on agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 农村地区的经济通常以农业为基础。

detailed_translations.english: areas in the countryside, away from cities and towns

sentences.english: a London suburb
sentences.chinese: 一个伦敦郊区

sentences.english: a kid from the suburbs
sentences.chinese: 来自郊区的小孩子

detailed_translations.english: an area where people live which is away from the centre of a town or city

sentences.english: We often go downtown to shop and visit friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常去市中心购物和拜访朋友。

sentences.english: The movie theater is located just downtown.
sentences.chinese: 电影院就在市中心附近。

sentences.english: Many people commute to downtown for work every day.
sentences.chinese: 许多人每天通勤到市中心上班。

detailed_translations.english: toward or in the center of a town or city

sentences.english: They live in a semi-detached house with a small garden at the back.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在一栋带后院小花园的半独立式房屋里。

sentences.english: Semi-detached houses are popular in suburban areas.
sentences.chinese: 半独立式房屋在郊区很受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: describing a house that has a shared wall with another house, forming one large house divided into two separate homes

sentences.english: They live in a detached house in the suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在郊区的一栋独立房屋里。

sentences.english: The detached house has a large garden.
sentences.chinese: 这栋独立房屋有一个大花园。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or connected with other similar buildings

sentences.english: The row of terraced houses looked charming from the street.
sentences.chinese: 一排排的联排房屋从街道上看去很迷人。

sentences.english: They grew vegetables in the small gardens at the back of their terraced house.
sentences.chinese: 他们在联排房屋后面的一个小花园里种蔬菜。

sentences.english: Terraced houses are common in many European countries.
sentences.chinese: 联排房屋在欧洲许多国家很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a row of houses built close together, typically in a village or suburb

sentences.english: houses with flat roofs
sentences.chinese: 平顶房

sentences.english: a perfectly flat sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 十分平坦的沙滩

sentences.english: The countryside near there is flat as a pancake (= very flat ) .
sentences.chinese: 那儿附近的乡间地势非常平坦。

sentences.english: Work on a clean, flat surface.
sentences.chinese: 在干净、平整的台面上工作。

detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment in the city center.
sentences.chinese: 她住在市中心的一间小公寓里。

sentences.english: We are looking for a two-bedroom apartment near the university.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找大学附近的一个带两个卧室的公寓。

sentences.english: The apartment has a beautiful view of the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这个公寓有一个美丽的山景。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms in a building for one family or person

sentences.english: She lived in a college dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一幢大学宿舍楼里。

detailed_translations.english: a large building at a college or university where students live

sentences.english: My dorm always has the best parties.
sentences.chinese: 我的宿舍总是有最好的派对。

sentences.english: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.english: I saw her around campus occasionally - she lived in the same dorm as a girl I dated that year, but nothing noteworthy ever really happened.
sentences.chinese: 我偶尔会在学校里看到她——她跟我那年交往的一个女孩住在同一个宿舍，但是从来没发生过什么值得注意的事。

detailed_translations.english: a  dormitory

sentences.english: We booked a room at a student hotel near the university.
sentences.chinese: 我们在大学附近预订了一家学生旅馆的房间。

sentences.english: The student hotel offers budget-friendly accommodations for students.
sentences.chinese: 学生旅馆为学生提供经济实惠的住宿。

sentences.english: Many international students stay at student hotels to save money.
sentences.chinese: 许多国际学生住在学生旅馆以节省开支。

detailed_translations.english: a hotel that provides accommodation for students, often at a lower price than other hotels

sentences.english: We stayed at a youth hostel during our trip to Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们在去欧洲旅行时住在一个青年旅社里。

sentences.english: Youth hostels are affordable and offer a chance to meet other travelers.
sentences.chinese: 青年旅社价格实惠，还提供了结识其他旅行者的机会。

detailed_translations.english: a cheap place for travelers, especially young people, to stay, often providing shared accommodation

sentences.english: The hotel room was fully furnished, making it comfortable for our stay.
sentences.chinese: 酒店房间是全套家具的，使得我们的住宿很舒适。

sentences.english: They decided to rent an unfurnished apartment and buy their own furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定租一个无家具的公寓，并自己购买家具。

detailed_translations.english: equipped with furniture

sentences.english: We are looking for a one-bedroom apartment in Shanghai, preferably unfurnished.
sentences.chinese: 我们在上海寻找一套一居室的公寓，最好是未装修的。

sentences.english: The hotel room was unfurnished, so we had to bring our own furniture.
sentences.chinese: 酒店房间是未装修的，所以我们不得不自己带家具。

detailed_translations.english: not provided with furniture

sentences.english: We entered the grand entrance hall of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我们进入了酒店宏伟的大堂。

sentences.english: The entrance hall was decorated with beautiful artwork.
sentences.chinese: 大堂装饰着精美的艺术品。

sentences.english: The reception desk is located in the entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 接待台位于大堂。

detailed_translations.english: a main room in a building that leads into other rooms

sentences.english: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.chinese: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed
a group of people who try to persuade a government that a particular law or situation should be changed

sentences.english: We sat on the front porch enjoying the evening breeze.
sentences.chinese: 我们在前廊上坐着，享受着傍晚的微风。

sentences.english: The old house had a spacious porch with intricate carvings.
sentences.chinese: 那座老房子有一个宽敞的廊子，上面有复杂的雕刻。

detailed_translations.english: a covered area at the entrance of a building

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

sentences.english: He found a bedsit in London while he was studying there.
sentences.chinese: 他在伦敦学习期间找到了一个床位公寓。

sentences.english: A bedsit is a type of housing that combines a bed and a sitting area in one room.
sentences.chinese: 床位公寓是一种将床和客厅区域结合在同一个房间内的住房类型。

detailed_translations.english: a type of housing that combines a bed and a sitting area in one room, often used by students or single people

sentences.english: I need to clean my bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 我需要打扫我的卧室。

sentences.english: The bedroom is on the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 卧室在二楼。

sentences.english: She painted her bedroom blue.
sentences.chinese: 她把她的卧室漆成了蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: a room in a house where people sleep

sentences.english: We usually watch TV in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 我们通常在客厅里看电视。

sentences.english: The living room is spacious and well-decorated.
sentences.chinese: 客厅宽敞且装饰精美。

sentences.english: They are having a party in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在客厅里举办派对。

detailed_translations.english: a room in a house used for sitting in and entertaining guests

sentences.english: Nathan was lounging on the grass bank outside the cottage.
sentences.chinese: 内森正懒洋洋地躺在小屋外的草堤上。

detailed_translations.english: to stand, sit, or lie in a lazy or relaxed way
a  waiting room  at an airport

sentences.english: We have a single room available for rent.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一间单人房出租。

sentences.english: He prefers a single room for more privacy.
sentences.chinese: 他更喜欢单人房以获得更多隐私。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or done by one person alone

sentences.english: This house has a spacious double bedroom for guests.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子有一个宽敞的双人卧室供客人使用。

sentences.english: They decided to convert the spare room into a double bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定将那个闲置的房间改造成双人卧室。

detailed_translations.english: a bedroom suitable for two people

sentences.english: I need to go to the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我需要去洗手间。

sentences.english: The bathroom is on the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 洗手间在二楼。

sentences.english: Can I use your bathroom?
sentences.chinese: 我可以使用一下你的洗手间吗？

detailed_translations.english: a room in a building containing a toilet and usually a bath or shower

sentences.english: She took a quick shower before heading out.
sentences.chinese: 她出门前快速洗了个淋浴。

sentences.english: We need to give the bathroom a shower to clean it thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要彻底冲洗一下浴室。

sentences.english: He prefers to shower every morning to wake up refreshed.
sentences.chinese: 他更喜欢每天早上淋浴来让自己精神焕发。

detailed_translations.chinese: 淋浴；阵雨；(一连串的)动作或事件
detailed_translations.english: a short period of washing your body with water under a spray
to wash your body with water under a spray

sentences.english: She spent the morning cooking in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 她花了一个上午在厨房里做饭。

sentences.english: The kitchen is the heart of the house.
sentences.chinese: 厨房是房子的中心。

sentences.english: We need to clean the kitchen before dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我们晚饭前需要打扫厨房。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area where food is prepared and cooked

sentences.english: They decided to start a small business and shared kitchen space to save costs.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定开一家小公司，并共享厨房空间以节省成本。

sentences.english: The co-working space provides a shared kitchen for members to prepare their meals.
sentences.chinese: 这个联合办公空间为成员提供了共享厨房，方便他们准备餐食。

sentences.english: Make sure to clean up after using the shared kitchen facilities.
sentences.chinese: 使用完共享厨房设施后，请务必清理干净。

detailed_translations.english: a kitchen that is available for use by multiple people or organizations

sentences.english: He worked in the garage fixing cars.
sentences.chinese: 他在车库里修理汽车。

sentences.english: She keeps her tools in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 她把工具存放在车库里。

sentences.english: They converted the attic into a garage.
sentences.chinese: 他们把阁楼改造成了车库。

detailed_translations.english: a building or room used for parking or storing cars or other vehicles

sentences.english: The living room is covered with a soft red carpet.
sentences.chinese: 客厅铺着一块柔软的红色地毯。

sentences.english: Please don't walk on the new carpet.
sentences.chinese: 请不要在新地毯上行走。

sentences.english: We need to clean the carpet to remove the stain.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要清洁地毯以去除污渍。

detailed_translations.english: a floor covering made of woven or tufted fabric

sentences.english: She placed a soft rug under the coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 她在咖啡桌下放了一条柔软的地毯。

sentences.english: The cold stone floor felt better with a rug on it.
sentences.chinese: 铺上地毯后，冰冷的石地板感觉好多了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick, usually woven fabric, placed on the floor to cover it, often for decoration or warmth

sentences.english: She bought a new pillow case for her bed.
sentences.chinese: 她为她的床买了一个新的枕套。

sentences.english: He folded the pillow case neatly.
sentences.chinese: 他把枕套整齐地叠了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a pillow

sentences.english: She was reading a sheet of music.
sentences.chinese: 她在读一张乐谱。

sentences.english: Please put a new sheet in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 请给打印机放一张新纸。

sentences.english: The bedsheet was white and clean.
sentences.chinese: 床单是白色的，很干净。

detailed_translations.english: a flat rectangular piece of paper, cloth, or other material
a piece of cloth used as a covering for a bed
a single page in a spreadsheet program

sentences.english: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.chinese: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.english: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.english: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of a bed that you lie on

sentences.english: The news spread quickly through the town.
sentences.chinese: 消息在镇上迅速传开。

sentences.english: She spread the butter evenly on the toast.
sentences.chinese: 她把黄油均匀地涂在吐司上。

sentences.english: The company plans to spread its operations to new markets.
sentences.chinese: 公司计划将其业务扩展到新的市场。

detailed_translations.english: to become known or spread widely; to extend over a large area
to put a thin layer of something on a surface
to extend activities or influence over a wide area

sentences.english: She put a soft pillow under her head.
sentences.chinese: 她在头下放了一个柔软的枕头。

sentences.english: He fell asleep with his face in the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 他脸埋在枕头里睡着了。

sentences.english: The hotel offered a variety of pillows to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店提供多种枕头供选择。

detailed_translations.english: a pad of soft material used to support the head when lying down

sentences.english: The cushion provided by his savings helped him through the tough economic period.
sentences.chinese: 他的储蓄提供的缓冲帮助他度过了艰难的经济时期。

sentences.english: She sat down on the cushion to make herself more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在垫子上，让自己更舒服些。

sentences.english: The shock absorber in a car acts as a cushion for the passengers.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的减震器对乘客来说起到了缓冲作用。

detailed_translations.chinese: 垫子；缓冲；缓冲垫；缓和作用
detailed_translations.english: a soft bag filled with feathers, foam, or other soft material, used to sit on or to protect something
a thing that reduces the effect of a shock or sudden change

sentences.english: The mud disappeared under a blanket of snow.
sentences.chinese: 泥地在一层白雪的覆盖下消失不见了。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

sentences.english: He wiped his face with a towel.
sentences.chinese: 他用毛巾擦了擦脸。

sentences.english: Please bring me a dry towel.
sentences.chinese: 请给我拿一条干毛巾。

sentences.english: The beach provides free beach towels for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 海滩为游客提供免费沙滩毛巾。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth used for drying the body, especially the face and hands

sentences.english: We placed the coffee table in the middle of the living room.
sentences.chinese: 我们把咖啡桌放在客厅中央。

sentences.english: The coffee table is made of glass.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡桌是由玻璃制成的。

detailed_translations.english: a table used in a living room for keeping drinks, books, etc. on

sentences.english: She was comfortably reading a book in her armchair.
sentences.chinese: 她舒适地坐在扶手椅里看书。

sentences.english: He collapsed into the armchair after a long day at work.
sentences.chinese: 经过一天的工作，他瘫倒在扶手椅里。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable chair with arms

sentences.english: We sat on the sofa and watched the movie together.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在沙发上一起看了电影。

sentences.english: The sofa in the living room is very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 客厅里的沙发非常舒适。

sentences.english: Could you move the sofa a bit so I can pass through?
sentences.chinese: 你能把沙发稍微移一下，让我能过去吗？

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a soft back and arms, used for sitting

sentences.english: She put a kettle on the stove to boil water.
sentences.chinese: 她把水壶放在炉子上烧水。

sentences.english: The hotel room came with a kettle and a variety of teas.
sentences.chinese: 酒店房间配有一个水壶和多种茶叶。

detailed_translations.english: a container for boiling water

sentences.english: She sat on a wooden stool by the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在壁炉旁的一个木凳子上。

sentences.english: He used a stool to reach the top shelf.
sentences.chinese: 他踩着凳子够到了最上面的架子。

sentences.english: The chef prepared the meal while standing on a stool.
sentences.chinese: 厨师站在凳子上准备餐点。

detailed_translations.english: a seat without a back or arms, typically on a single block of wood or metal, used for sitting on the floor or for reaching something high

sentences.english: People are tapping into the power supply illegally.
sentences.chinese: 人们在非法取电。

sentences.english: We hope that additional sources of funding can be tapped.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望还有其他资金来源可以利用。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻拍； 利用， 开发
detailed_translations.english: to use or take what is needed from something such as an energy supply or an amount of money

sentences.english: The water sank to the bottom of the sink.
sentences.chinese: 水沉到了水槽的底部。

sentences.english: He sank into a coma after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故后，他陷入了昏迷。

sentences.english: The company's profits have sunk significantly this quarter.
sentences.chinese: 公司本季度的利润显著下降。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下沉； 沉没； 降低
detailed_translations.english: to go down or drop to a lower level or position
to cause something to sink
to become depressed or low in spirits

sentences.english: I kept the leftover food in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我把剩下的食物放在橱柜里。

sentences.english: The old cupboard in the kitchen needed fixing.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里的那个旧橱柜需要修理了。

sentences.english: She opened the cupboard to get a cup.
sentences.chinese: 她打开橱柜拿了一个杯子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with shelves or drawers for storing household items

sentences.english: She took a relaxing bath after a long day of work.
sentences.chinese: 她工作了一整天后泡了个放松的澡。

sentences.english: The baby needs a bath.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝需要洗澡了。

sentences.english: We go for a bath every evening.
sentences.chinese: 我们每晚都洗澡。

detailed_translations.english: a bath is a container for a bath, or a room in a house containing a bath
to wash your body in a bath

sentences.english: Could you please take me to the toilet?
sentences.chinese: 你能带我去洗手间吗？

sentences.english: There is no toilet paper in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 洗手间里没有卫生纸。

sentences.english: She went to the toilet for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 她去洗手间待了一会儿。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building that contains a toilet and sometimes a sink
a toilet

sentences.english: a wood-burning stove
sentences.chinese: 烧木柴的火炉

detailed_translations.english: a piece of kitchen equipment on which you cook food in pots and pans, and that contains an  oven

sentences.english: We preheated the oven to 200 degrees before baking the cake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在烤蛋糕之前把烤箱预热到了200度。

sentences.english: He put the bread in the oven to bake.
sentences.chinese: 他把面包放进了烤箱里烘烤。

detailed_translations.english: an appliance used for cooking food by dry heat, typically with a metal box divided into compartments and heated by electricity or gas

sentences.english: She put the plates in the dishwasher after dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐后，她把盘子放进洗碗机里。

sentences.english: The dishwasher is broken and cannot wash the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗机坏了，不能洗盘子。

sentences.english: He decided to buy a new dishwasher because the old one was inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 他决定买一台新的洗碗机，因为旧的效率不高。

detailed_translations.english: an electrical machine for washing dishes automatically

sentences.english: I put the leftover vegetables in the freezer to save them for later.
sentences.chinese: 我把剩菜蔬菜放进了冷冻室，以便以后食用。

sentences.english: The ice cream started to melt because it fell out of the freezer.
sentences.chinese: 冰淇淋开始融化了，因为它掉出了冷冻室。

sentences.english: We need a new freezer because this one is full.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个新的冷冻室，因为现在的这个已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: a device for keeping food cold by using a refrigerant that circulates within a closed system

sentences.english: I need to make a telephone call to the office.
sentences.chinese: 我需要给办公室打个电话。

sentences.english: She answered the telephone with a polite greeting.
sentences.chinese: 她有礼貌地回答了电话。

sentences.english: The invention of the telephone revolutionized communication.
sentences.chinese: 电话的发明彻底改变了通讯方式。

detailed_translations.english: a device for sending and receiving sound signals over a distance

detailed_translations.chinese: 给...打电话； 打电话给...
detailed_translations.english: to make a telephone call to someone

sentences.english: I need to buy a new washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一台新的洗衣机。

sentences.english: The washing machine is making a loud noise.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣机正在发出很大的噪音。

sentences.english: She put her clothes in the washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 她把衣服放进洗衣机里。

detailed_translations.english: a machine used for washing clothes

sentences.english: Turn on the air-conditioner to cool down the room.
sentences.chinese: 打开空调来给房间降温。

sentences.english: The air-conditioner in this hotel room is very noisy.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店房间的空调非常吵。

sentences.english: We need to check if the air-conditioner is working properly.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要检查空调是否正常工作。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that controls the temperature and humidity of the air in a room or building

sentences.english: Central air-conditioning provides consistent cooling throughout the entire house.
sentences.chinese: 中央空调为整栋房子提供一致的制冷效果。

sentences.english: Many modern homes are equipped with central air-conditioning for comfort.
sentences.chinese: 许多现代住宅配备了中央空调以提供舒适的环境。

detailed_translations.english: a system that circulates air and usually cool it throughout a building

sentences.english: Central heating keeps the house warm and comfortable all year round.
sentences.chinese: 集中供暖使整个房子一年四季都温暖舒适。

sentences.english: Many modern homes are equipped with central heating systems.
sentences.chinese: 许多现代住宅都配备了集中供暖系统。

sentences.english: Central heating is more energy-efficient than individual heating units.
sentences.chinese: 集中供暖比单独的供暖设备更节能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中供暖；中央供暖系统
detailed_translations.english: a system for heating a building or area by distributing hot air or water throughout it

sentences.english: We use electric fans to keep the room cool during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们夏天使用电风扇来保持房间凉爽。

sentences.english: The electric fans in the office help to circulate the air.
sentences.chinese: 办公室里的电风扇有助于空气流通。

sentences.english: Make sure to unplug the electric fans when you leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 离开房间时记得拔掉电风扇。

detailed_translations.english: a device that creates a flow of air for cooling

sentences.english: Please put the popcorn in a microwave-safe bowl before heating it in the microwave oven.
sentences.chinese: 在用微波炉加热前，请将爆米花放入微波炉安全的碗中。

sentences.english: The microwave oven can heat food quickly and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 微波炉可以快速高效地加热食物。

detailed_translations.english: an appliance that cooks food by passing microwave radiation through it

sentences.english: We need to check if the electric stoves are functioning properly before cooking.
sentences.chinese: 在做饭之前，我们需要检查电炉是否正常工作。

sentences.english: Electric stoves are more energy-efficient than gas stoves.
sentences.chinese: 与燃气灶相比，电炉更节能。

sentences.english: The chef prefers to use electric stoves for precise temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 厨师更喜欢使用电炉，因为它们可以精确控制温度。

detailed_translations.english: stoves that use electricity for cooking

sentences.english: The radiator in the car stopped working, so we couldn't stay warm.
sentences.chinese: 汽车里的散热器坏了，所以我们无法保持温暖。

sentences.english: She adjusted the radiator to make the room more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 她调整了散热器，使房间更舒适。

detailed_translations.english: a device for heating a room or building, typically by means of hot water or steam circulating through it

sentences.english: Most students rent rooms in their second year.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生到二年级时租房居住。

sentences.english: I’d rather have my own house than rent.
sentences.chinese: 我更想有自己的房子，不想租房。

detailed_translations.english: to regularly pay money to live in a house or room that belongs to someone else, or to use something that belongs to someone else
the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else

sentences.english: A friend drove her to Atlanta, where she picked up a rental car.
sentences.chinese: 一个朋友开车送她去了亚特兰大，在那里她租到了一辆车。

detailed_translations.english: You use rental to describe things that are connected with the renting out of goods, properties, and services
the money that you pay to use a car, television, or other machine over a period of time

sentences.english: The rental price of this apartment is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 这套公寓的租金相当高。

sentences.english: We need to negotiate the rental price with the landlord.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要与房东协商租金。

sentences.english: The rental price includes utilities and maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 租金包括水电费和维护费。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money paid regularly for the use of a property or service

sentences.english: I feel uncomfortable because there is no privacy in this open-plan office.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得不舒服，因为在这个开放式办公室里没有隐私。

sentences.english: The constant interruptions really take away my privacy at work.
sentences.chinese: 不断的打扰真的让我在工作中失去了隐私。

sentences.english: In a small town, it's hard to have any privacy at all.
sentences.chinese: 在一个小镇上，根本很难有任何隐私。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from observation or disturbance by others

sentences.english: The apartment is partially furnished, so you'll need to bring some of your own furniture.
sentences.chinese: 这套公寓是部分装修的，所以你需要带一些你自己的家具。

sentences.english: We offer partially furnished rooms at a more affordable price point.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供部分装修的房间，价格更实惠。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分装修的；部分布置的
detailed_translations.english: furnished to some extent, but not completely

sentences.english: The residential number is required on the application form.
sentences.chinese: 申请表上需要填写住宅号码。

sentences.english: What is your residential number for verification purposes?
sentences.chinese: 请提供您的住宅号码以供核实。

detailed_translations.english: the number assigned to a residential property

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可获得的， 可得到的； 可用的； 有空的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

sentences.english: I need to charge my mobile phone before I go out.
sentences.chinese: 我出门前需要给我的手机充电。

sentences.english: She received a text message on her mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 她在手机上收到了一条短信。

sentences.english: This mobile phone has a high-resolution camera.
sentences.chinese: 这部手机有一个高分辨率的摄像头。

detailed_translations.english: a portable telephone that connects to a cellular system and has a number assigned to it

sentences.english: She is always reachable on her cellular phone.
sentences.chinese: 她总是在她的手机上可以联系。

sentences.english: He forgot to charge his cellular phone last night.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚忘了给手机充电。

sentences.english: The cellular phone plan includes unlimited text messages.
sentences.chinese: 这个手机套餐包括无限短信。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone that communicates through a network of cells covering a large geographical area

sentences.english: I prefer using a cordless phone for mobility around the house.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜欢使用无绳电话，这样可以在房子里移动。

sentences.english: The cordless phone's battery life needs to be long enough for all-day use.
sentences.chinese: 无绳电话的电池寿命需要足够长，以供全天使用。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone that is not connected by a wire to its base

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of channels through satellite TV.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过卫星电视接收数百个频道。

sentences.english: Satellite TV provides better picture quality than cable TV in remote areas.
sentences.chinese: 在偏远地区，卫星电视提供的画质比有线电视更好。

sentences.english: He subscribes to a satellite TV service to watch international sports events.
sentences.chinese: 他订阅了卫星电视服务以观看国际体育赛事。

detailed_translations.english: a television service that uses satellites to transmit signals to receivers on Earth

sentences.english: We get our news from cable TV channels.
sentences.chinese: 我们从有线电视频道获取新闻。

sentences.english: Cable TV offers a wide variety of programming.
sentences.chinese: 有线电视提供各种各样的节目。

sentences.english: Many people still prefer cable TV over streaming services.
sentences.chinese: 许多人仍然更喜欢有线电视而不是流媒体服务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有线电视； 有线电视节目
detailed_translations.english: television that is transmitted through cables

sentences.english: The satellite dish is an antenna used for receiving TV signals.
sentences.chinese: 卫星天线是用来接收电视信号的。

sentences.english: Many birds have long antennas to detect prey.
sentences.chinese: 许多鸟儿有长长的天线来探测猎物。

sentences.english: The car's antennas are used for radio and GPS signals.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的天线用于接收无线电和GPS信号。

detailed_translations.english: a device consisting of an arrangement of conductors that radiates or receives electromagnetic waves

sentences.english: The TV signal is weak, so we need an aerial to improve the reception.
sentences.chinese: 电视信号很弱，我们需要一个天线来改善接收效果。

sentences.english: He climbed up the ladder to adjust the aerial on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 他爬上梯子去调整屋顶上的天线。

detailed_translations.english: a system of wires and metal rods used to transmit or receive radio or television signals
relating to the air or space above the ground

sentences.english: The closed circuit TV system provides surveillance in the bank.
sentences.chinese: 闭路电视系统为银行提供监控。

sentences.english: The footage from the closed circuit TV was used as evidence in the trial.
sentences.chinese: 闭路电视拍摄的画面在审判中作为证据使用。

detailed_translations.chinese: 闭路电视系统；监控设备
detailed_translations.english: a system of television cameras connected to a limited number of monitors, typically for surveillance purposes

sentences.english: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.chinese: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed
a group of people who try to persuade a government that a particular law or situation should be changed

sentences.english: The lift lobby is a common area in many modern buildings.
sentences.chinese: 电梯厅是许多现代建筑中的常见区域。

sentences.english: We met in the lift lobby and went up to the office together.
sentences.chinese: 我们在电梯厅相遇，一起去了办公室。

detailed_translations.english: a large hall in a building where elevators are located

sentences.english: We stored the wine in the cellar.
sentences.chinese: 我们把酒存放在地窖里。

sentences.english: The cellar is damp and musty.
sentences.chinese: 地窖又潮湿又发霉。

sentences.english: He found a hidden treasure in the cellar.
sentences.chinese: 他在地窖里发现了一个隐藏的宝藏。

detailed_translations.english: a room or set of rooms below ground level, used for storing things, especially wine

sentences.english: a meeting with an important client
sentences.chinese: 与一位重要客户的会面

detailed_translations.chinese: 委托人； 顾客， 客户
detailed_translations.english: someone who gets services or advice from a professional person, company, or organization

sentences.english: The desk was left by the previous tenant.
sentences.chinese: 书桌是上一个房客留下来的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承租人； 房客； 佃户
detailed_translations.english: someone who lives in a house, room etc and pays rent to the person who owns it

sentences.english: My home stay experience in Japan was incredibly rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 我在日本的寄宿家庭经历非常有益。

sentences.english: We arranged a home stay with a local family to practice the language.
sentences.chinese: 我们安排和当地家庭寄宿以练习语言。

sentences.english: The home stay provided a unique opportunity to immerse myself in the culture.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭提供了一个独特的沉浸式文化体验的机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation where you live in the home of a family as a guest

sentences.english: We stayed with a local host family during our trip to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 在我们去日本的旅行期间，我们住在一个当地的寄宿家庭。

sentences.english: The host family provided us with delicious home-cooked meals.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭为我们提供了美味的家常菜。

sentences.english: Living with a host family gave us an authentic experience of the local culture.
sentences.chinese: 住在寄宿家庭让我们体验了当地文化的真实性。

detailed_translations.english: a family that provides accommodation and often food for a visitor, typically as part of a cultural exchange program

sentences.english: We decided to live in shared accommodation to save money.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定住合租公寓以节省开支。

sentences.english: Shared accommodation can be a great way to meet new people.
sentences.chinese: 合租是一种结识新朋友的好方式。

sentences.english: The shared accommodation had a kitchen and a living room for everyone to use.
sentences.chinese: 合租公寓有一个厨房和客厅供大家使用。

detailed_translations.english: accommodation that is shared by several people

sentences.english: The university hall is where important academic events are held.
sentences.chinese: 大学礼堂是举办重要学术活动的地方。

sentences.english: Students gathered in the university hall for the graduation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 学生们在大学礼堂聚集参加毕业典礼。

detailed_translations.english: a large building on a university campus that is used for lectures, ceremonies, and other events

sentences.english: The students live in the hall of residence near the university campus.
sentences.chinese: 学生们住在大学校园附近的学生宿舍里。

sentences.english: She applied for a room in the hall of residence last semester.
sentences.chinese: 她上个学期申请了学生宿舍的房间。

detailed_translations.english: a building that provides accommodation for students

sentences.english: The government will provide temporary accommodation for up to three thousand homeless people.
sentences.chinese: 政府将为多达三千无家可归的人提供临时住所。

detailed_translations.chinese: 住处， 膳宿； 适应， 调节
detailed_translations.english: Accommodation is buildings or rooms where people live or stay

sentences.english: The maximum rent for this apartment is $1,500 per month.
sentences.chinese: 这间公寓的最高租金是每月1500美元。

sentences.english: Landlords must adhere to the maximum rent limits set by the local government.
sentences.chinese: 房东必须遵守当地政府设定的最高租金限制。

detailed_translations.english: the highest amount of rent that is allowed to be charged for a property

sentences.english: The minimum rent for this apartment is $800 per month.
sentences.chinese: 这套公寓的最低租金是每月800美元。

sentences.english: They offered a lease agreement with a lower minimum rent compared to other places.
sentences.chinese: 他们提供了一个租赁协议，其最低租金与其他地方相比更低。

detailed_translations.english: the lowest amount of rent that must be paid for a property

sentences.english: The hotel offers a suite with a view of the city.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店提供一套享有城市景色的房间。

sentences.english: They upgraded to a larger suite for their anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 为了庆祝周年纪念日，他们升级到了一套更大的房间。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms in a hotel, usually private and including a bedroom, living room, and bathroom

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装饰， 装潢， 布置； 授勋
detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

sentences.english: a shelf covered with books and ornaments
sentences.chinese: 摆满书籍和装饰品的架子

sentences.english: a cabinet in which she kept her collection of china ornaments
sentences.chinese: 她放置瓷器摆设收藏品的柜子

detailed_translations.english: a small object that you keep in your house because it is beautiful rather than useful

sentences.english: She opened the shutters and gazed out over village roofs.
sentences.chinese: 她打开了百叶窗，朝村里的房顶望去。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers on the outside of a window that can be closed to keep light out or prevent thieves from coming in

sentences.english: Wearing sunglasses on a sunny day can be a real blinder.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光明媚的日子里戴太阳镜可能会让人眼前一亮（眩目）。

sentences.english: The blinder effect of the bright lights made it difficult to see the stage clearly.
sentences.chinese: 明亮灯光的眩目效应使得看不清舞台。

detailed_translations.chinese: 炫目物； 遮眼物； 令人眼花的东西
detailed_translations.english: something that makes it difficult to see clearly, especially bright light or something suddenly appearing

detailed_translations.chinese: （棒球）挡球手； 守内场者的掩护
detailed_translations.english: a player in baseball who guards home plate

sentences.english: red velvet curtains
sentences.chinese: 红色的丝绒窗帘

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hanging cloth that can be pulled across to cover a window, divide a room etc

sentences.english: The kitchen is well-stocked with various cooking utensils.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里备有各种烹饪用具。

sentences.english: Please pass me the utensils on the table.
sentences.chinese: 请把桌子上的餐具递给我。

sentences.english: These utensils are made of stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 这些餐具是由不锈钢制成的。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or implement used in a particular activity

sentences.english: Scuba-diving allows you to explore the underwater world freely.
sentences.chinese: 水肺潜水让你能够自由探索水下世界。

sentences.english: She has been scuba-diving since she was a teenager.
sentences.chinese: 她从十几岁开始就从事水肺潜水。

sentences.english: Scuba-diving requires proper training and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 水肺潜水需要适当的培训和设备。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or sport of diving in the sea or other bodies of water while using self-contained underwater breathing apparatus

sentences.english: We spent the morning snorkeling in the clear waters near the coral reef.
sentences.chinese: 我们在靠近珊瑚礁的清澈水域里浮潜了一上午。

sentences.english: Snorkeling is a great way to see underwater life without needing scuba gear.
sentences.chinese: 浮潜是观看水下生物的好方法，而且不需要潜水装备。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of swimming in the sea or a lake using a mask and a tube to see underwater

sentences.english: We took a glass-bottom boat to see the colorful coral reefs beneath the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘坐玻璃底船去看海底五彩缤纷的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: The glass-bottom of the boat allows us to observe marine life up close.
sentences.chinese: 船的玻璃底使我们能够近距离观察海洋生物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 玻璃底船（一种船的底部有透明玻璃，可以让人看到水下的景象）
detailed_translations.english: a boat with a glass bottom that allows people to see beneath the water

sentences.english: It is like the bow of the King of the Persians that is painted with vermilion and is tipped with coral.
sentences.chinese: 你的嘴唇就像是波斯王国的弯弓，那是一张涂上朱砂的弯弓，那是一张头上镶嵌珊瑚的弯弓。

sentences.english: I believe they are doing a good job with that. How about the coral? Is it really as beautiful as they say?
sentences.chinese: 我相信他们是在做好事。对了，珊瑚怎么样？它们真的就像人们说的那么漂亮吗？

detailed_translations.english: pink or reddish-orange in colour
a hard red, white, or pink substance formed from the bones of very small sea creatures, which is often used to make jewellery

sentences.english: Water skiing is a popular summer activity for many people.
sentences.chinese: 滑水是许多人夏季喜爱的活动。

sentences.english: He spent his childhood learning how to water ski.
sentences.chinese: 他在童年时学习了如何滑水。

detailed_translations.english: the sport or activity of skiing over the surface of water while being pulled behind a boat

sentences.english: We went white water rafting on the Colorado River last summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们去年夏天在科罗拉多河上漂流。

sentences.english: White water rafting is an exhilarating adventure for thrill-seekers.
sentences.chinese: 白水漂流是寻求刺激者的一项令人兴奋的冒险活动。

sentences.english: Always wear a helmet when white water rafting to stay safe.
sentences.chinese: 白水漂流时一定要戴上头盔以确保安全。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor water sport in which people travel down a river in a raft, often through rough or turbulent water

sentences.english: We watched the sunrise together from the top of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我们从山顶一起观看了日出。

sentences.english: The sunrise painted the sky in beautiful shades of orange and pink.
sentences.chinese: 日出将天空染成了美丽的橙粉色。

sentences.english: A sunrise always feels like a fresh start.
sentences.chinese: 日出总让人感觉像是一个新的开始。

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun first appears above the horizon in the morning

sentences.english: The sunset painted the sky in vibrant shades of orange and pink.
sentences.chinese: 日落将天空染成了鲜艳的橙粉色。

sentences.english: We watched the sunset together from the rooftop.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起在屋顶上欣赏日落。

sentences.english: The scent of blooming flowers filled the air as the sunset approached.
sentences.chinese: 随着日落临近，空气中弥漫着盛开花朵的香气。

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun stops shining on a place because it has set

sentences.english: The jellyfish drifted lazily through the water.
sentences.chinese: 水母悠闲地漂浮在水中。

sentences.english: We saw a jellyfish at the bottom of the tank.
sentences.chinese: 我们在鱼缸底部看到了一只水母。

detailed_translations.english: a free-swimming marine animal with a gelatinous body and tentacles

sentences.english: She applied sun block before going to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 她去海滩前涂抹了防晒霜。

sentences.english: This sun block provides high SPF protection against UV rays.
sentences.chinese: 这种防晒霜提供了高SPF值的紫外线防护。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that helps protect the skin from the sun's harmful rays

sentences.english: Make sure to apply sun screen before going outside.
sentences.chinese: 在出门前一定要涂抹防晒霜。

sentences.english: This sun screen provides broad-spectrum protection against UV rays.
sentences.chinese: 这款防晒霜能提供广谱防护，抵御紫外线。

detailed_translations.english: a lotion or cream spread on the skin to protect it from the sun's rays

sentences.english: He got sun burnt while playing football in the park.
sentences.chinese: 他在公园踢足球时晒成了日光浴。

sentences.english: She applied sunscreen to prevent getting sun burnt.
sentences.chinese: 她涂了防晒霜以防止晒伤。

detailed_translations.english: caused by exposure to the sun

sentences.english: She has a pale skin which doesn’t tan easily.
sentences.chinese: 她的肤色很白，不容易被晒黑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晒成棕褐色， 晒黑； 硝
detailed_translations.english: if you tan, or if the sun tans you, your skin becomes darker because you spend time in the sun
the attractive brown colour that someone with pale skin gets after they have been in the sun

sentences.english: The beach was crowded with bathers enjoying the sunny weather.
sentences.chinese: 海滩上挤满了享受晴朗天气的游泳者。

sentences.english: The lifeguard kept an eye on the bathers in the water.
sentences.chinese: 救生员一直注视着水中的游泳者。

detailed_translations.english: people who swim or bathe in water

sentences.english: The elephant's trunk is used for breathing, smelling, and picking up objects.
sentences.chinese: 大象的鼻子用于呼吸、嗅觉和捡拾物体。

sentences.english: The suitcase was too heavy, so I had to carry my trunk separately.
sentences.chinese: 手提箱太重了，所以我不得不分开携带我的行李箱。

sentences.english: Many animals have trunks, such as elephants and some species of monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 许多动物都有鼻子，例如大象和一些种类的猴子。

detailed_translations.english: the long nose of an elephant or similar animal; a case for clothes and other traveling goods

sentences.english: She wore sunglasses to protect her eyes from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她戴太阳镜来保护她的眼睛免受阳光的伤害。

sentences.english: The sunglasses were very stylish and reflected her personality.
sentences.chinese: 这些太阳镜非常时尚，反映了她的个性。

sentences.english: He forgot to put on his sunglasses before going outside.
sentences.chinese: 他出门前忘了戴上太阳镜。

detailed_translations.english: a pair of glasses worn to protect the eyes from the sun

sentences.english: She spread the beach towel on the sand near the water.
sentences.chinese: 她在靠近水的地方铺开了沙滩巾。

sentences.english: We took a beach towel to dry off with after swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我们带了一条沙滩巾，游泳后用来擦干身体。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of cloth used for lying on the beach or drying off after a bath or swim

sentences.english: We set up a tent by the lake for our camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们在湖边搭起了一个帐篷，为我们的露营旅行做准备。

sentences.english: The children loved playing in the tent during the picnic.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在野餐时喜欢在帐篷里玩耍。

sentences.english: This tent is very durable and can withstand strong winds.
sentences.chinese: 这个帐篷非常耐用，可以抵御强风。

detailed_translations.english: a portable shelter made of canvas or similar material, used for camping or protection from the elements

sentences.english: We are going on a picnic this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个周末要去野餐。

sentences.english: They packed a picnic lunch and went to the park.
sentences.chinese: 他们打包了野餐午餐，去了公园。

sentences.english: A picnic is a great way to spend time with family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 野餐是与家人和朋友共度时光的好方式。

detailed_translations.english: a meal that you take in a pleasant place outside, usually in a picnic basket

sentences.english: an expedition to the North Pole
sentences.chinese: 北极探险

sentences.english: another Qomolangma expedition
sentences.chinese: 又一次珠穆朗玛峰探险

detailed_translations.chinese: 远征， 探险， 考察； 旅行， 出行； 远征队， 探险队， 考察队
detailed_translations.english: a long and carefully organized journey, especially to a dangerous or unfamiliar place, or the people that make this journey

sentences.english: a shopping excursion
sentences.chinese: 购物游

detailed_translations.chinese: 远足， 短途旅游； 【物】 偏移， 漂移
detailed_translations.english: a short journey arranged so that a group of people can visit a place, especially while they are on holiday

sentences.english: If you follow the map carefully, you won't get lost.
sentences.chinese: 如果你仔细按照地图走，你不会迷路的。

sentences.english: He got lost in the crowd and couldn't find his way back.
sentences.chinese: 他在人群中迷了路，找不到回来的路。

sentences.english: Make sure you don't get lost on your way home.
sentences.chinese: 确保你回家路上不会迷路。

detailed_translations.english: to find yourself in a place where you do not know where you are or how to get back to where you want to be
to cause someone to be lost or confused

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

sentences.english: He wore a helmet while riding his motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 他骑摩托车时戴了头盔。

sentences.english: The construction workers are required to wear helmets.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人被要求佩戴头盔。

sentences.english: The helmet saved his life during the accident.
sentences.chinese: 头盔在事故中救了他的命。

detailed_translations.english: a protective head covering worn to prevent injury

sentences.english: They lit the torch to start the race.
sentences.chinese: 他们点燃火炬来开始比赛。

sentences.english: The ancient Romans used torches for lighting.
sentences.chinese: 古罗马人使用火炬来照明。

sentences.english: She carried a torch for her lost love.
sentences.chinese: 她为失去的爱人怀有深情。

detailed_translations.english: a staff or stick carrying a lighted flame, used formerly for lighting, signaling, or as a symbol of authority or beacon

detailed_translations.chinese: （对已故或失去的爱人的）恋情；暗恋
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of love for someone you cannot have, especially someone who has died or with whom you cannot be together
to provide light for

sentences.english: He used a flash light to see in the dark room.
sentences.chinese: 他用手电筒在黑暗的房间里照明。

sentences.english: Make sure to bring a flash light on your camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 确保在你的露营旅行中带上手电筒。

detailed_translations.english: a portable device that produces a bright light for illuminating something

sentences.english: She slept soundly under the mosquito net.
sentences.chinese: 她在蚊帐下睡得很香。

sentences.english: The mosquito net is an effective way to protect against malaria.
sentences.chinese: 蚊帐是预防疟疾的有效方法。

detailed_translations.english: a net used to keep mosquitoes away while sleeping

sentences.english: Insects are the most diverse group of animals on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫是地球上种类最多的动物群体。

sentences.english: The ladybug is a common insect found in gardens.
sentences.chinese: 瓢虫是花园里常见的一种昆虫。

sentences.english: Many insects play important roles in pollination.
sentences.chinese: 许多昆虫在授粉中扮演着重要的角色。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature with six legs and usually wings

sentences.english: The smell of the paint was very repellent.
sentences.chinese: 油漆的气味非常令人厌恶。

sentences.english: The insect repellent worked effectively.
sentences.chinese: 驱虫剂非常有效。

sentences.english: His behavior was repellent to most people.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为令大多数人感到厌恶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人厌恶的；令人反感的；驱除的
detailed_translations.english: causing someone to feel disgust or dislike
a substance that keeps insects or other animals away

sentences.english: We need a good pair of hiking boots for the mountain trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一双好用的徒步鞋去爬山。

sentences.english: Make sure your hiking boots are comfortable and waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 确保你的徒步鞋既舒适又防水。

detailed_translations.english: boots designed for hiking, offering support and durability

sentences.english: I need to buy some new socks for winter.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一些新袜子来过冬。

sentences.english: He always wears colorful socks with his casual clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他总是穿着色彩鲜艳的袜子搭配休闲装。

sentences.english: The baby outgrew his socks quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那个婴儿很快就穿不下一双袜子了。

detailed_translations.english: a pair of foot coverings typically worn in pairs and made of woven fabric

sentences.english: The constant irritation plants can lead to chronic stress and health issues.
sentences.chinese: 持续的植物刺激可能导致慢性压力和健康问题。

detailed_translations.english: the act of irritating or the state of being irritated

sentences.english: Many people get a thrill from bungee jumping.
sentences.chinese: 很多人从蹦极跳中获得刺激感。

sentences.english: Bungee jumping is considered an extreme sport.
sentences.chinese: 蹦极被认为是一项极限运动。

sentences.english: She decided to try bungee jumping for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 她决定为生日尝试蹦极。

detailed_translations.english: an activity in which you jump from a high place and fall for a short time before a special elastic rope pulls you back up

sentences.english: Rock climbing is a challenging but rewarding sport.
sentences.chinese: 攀岩是一项具有挑战性但回报丰厚的运动。

sentences.english: She has been rock climbing for over ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她攀岩已经超过十年了。

sentences.english: Rock climbing requires strength, endurance, and technique.
sentences.chinese: 攀岩需要力量、耐力和技巧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 攀岩； 陡峭的悬崖； 岩石
detailed_translations.english: the activity of climbing up rocks or rock faces
to climb up a rock face

sentences.english: Hang gliding offers a unique way to experience the beauty of the outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 悬挂式滑翔提供了一种独特的体验户外美景的方式。

sentences.english: Many people are drawn to hang gliding for its thrill and freedom.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被悬挂式滑翔的刺激和自由所吸引。

sentences.english: Hang gliding requires skill, balance, and courage.
sentences.chinese: 悬挂式滑翔需要技巧、平衡和勇气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 悬挂式滑翔；悬挂式滑翔运动
detailed_translations.english: a recreational activity in which you glide through the air using a lightweight, triangular glider

sentences.english: He enjoys parachuting as a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢跳伞这项爱好。

sentences.english: The pilot decided to use a parachute for a emergency landing.
sentences.chinese: 飞行员决定使用降落伞进行紧急着陆。

sentences.english: She took her first parachuting lesson last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她上周末参加了她的第一次跳伞课程。

detailed_translations.english: the act of jumping from an aircraft and using a parachute to slow your descent

sentences.english: The medieval castle was a formidable stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪的城堡是一座强大的要塞。

sentences.english: They spent the weekend exploring the old castle.
sentences.chinese: 他们花了一个周末探索古老的城堡。

sentences.english: The castle stands on a high hill, offering a panoramic view of the surrounding area.
sentences.chinese: 城堡矗立在高山上，提供周围地区的全景视野。

detailed_translations.english: a large and strong building, typically from the Middle Ages, built to protect a country or region

sentences.english: We visited the ancient temple, which was believed to be over a thousand years old.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了一座据说有上千年历史的古老寺庙。

sentences.english: The ancient temple is a significant historical site and a popular tourist attraction.
sentences.chinese: 这座古老寺庙是一个重要的历史遗址，也是热门的旅游景点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 古代的庙宇；古老的寺庙
detailed_translations.english: a building used for religious worship in ancient times

sentences.english: The cathedral is the largest church in the city.
sentences.chinese: 大教堂是这座城市最大的教堂。

sentences.english: We were amazed by the beautiful architecture of the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 我们惊叹于大教堂美丽的建筑。

detailed_translations.english: a large and important church, especially one that is the main church in a bishop's area

sentences.english: In Amsterdam the girls all stand in the windows shimmering as tantalising as tropical fish beyond the gleam of aquarium glass.
sentences.chinese: 在阿姆斯特丹，姑娘们都站在窗后，光芒四射柔情撩人宛如水族馆玻璃背后脉脉含情的热带鱼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 养鱼池； 玻璃缸； 水族馆
detailed_translations.english: a clear glass or plastic container for fish and other water animals

sentences.english: We spent the afternoon exploring the botanical garden and learning about rare plants.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了整个下午探索植物园，学习关于稀有植物的知识。

sentences.english: The botanical garden offers guided tours for visitors to discover different species of flora.
sentences.chinese: 植物园为游客提供导览服务，以发现不同种类的植物。

detailed_translations.english: a garden containing living plants, especially those collected for scientific study

sentences.english: We spent the whole day at the amusement park with our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们和孩子一整天都花在游乐园里了。

sentences.english: The roller coaster at the amusement park is the tallest in the region.
sentences.chinese: 游乐园里的过山车是整个地区最高的。

detailed_translations.english: a place with rides and games for amusement

sentences.english: We visit an organic farm to learn about sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了一个有机农场，以了解可持续农业。

sentences.english: Organic farms do not use synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 有机农场不使用合成农药或肥料。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or denoting a product grown or manufactured without the use of artificial chemicals
a farm that produces food according to organic farming methods

sentences.english: The Grand Canyon is a vast and beautiful valley in Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷是亚利桑那州一个广阔而美丽的山谷。

sentences.english: They decided to explore the hidden valley deep in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定探索深山中的隐藏山谷。

sentences.english: The valley is known for its fertile soil and rich agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 这个山谷以其肥沃的土壤和丰富的农业而闻名。

detailed_translations.english: a low area between mountains or hills, often with a river flowing through it

sentences.english: The waterfall rushed down the rocky cliff with great force.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布以巨大的力量沿着岩石悬崖奔腾而下。

sentences.english: We took a refreshing swim in the pool at the base of the waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 我们在瀑布底部的泳池里畅游，感觉十分清爽。

detailed_translations.english: a large flow of water falling from a height

sentences.english: We spent the afternoon relaxing in the hot spring near the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们在村附近的热泉旁度过了下午的时光。

sentences.english: The hot spring is famous for its therapeutic properties.
sentences.chinese: 这个热泉以其治疗功效而闻名。

detailed_translations.english: a spring that has water at a temperature higher than the surrounding air

sentences.english: Bush walking is a popular activity for many people in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 徒步旅行是澳大利亚许多人的一项流行活动。

sentences.english: We went bush walking in the mountains last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们上周六去了山区徒步旅行。

sentences.english: Bush walking requires good physical fitness and preparation.
sentences.chinese: 徒步旅行需要良好的体能和准备。

detailed_translations.english: a long walk in the countryside, especially in a forest or mountain area

sentences.english: His punishing work schedule had made him resort to drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他那累人的工作日程已经使他不得不求助于毒品了。

detailed_translations.english: If you resort to a course of action that you do not really approve of, you adopt it because you cannot see any other way of achieving what you want
a place where a lot of people go for holidays

sentences.english: The voyage from England to India used to take six months.
sentences.chinese: 过去从英格兰到印度要航行六个月。

sentences.english: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.chinese: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.english: I don’t want to make the voyage single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 我不想独自航行。

sentences.english: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是“企业”号星舰几次航行的经历。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行， 航行， 飞行
detailed_translations.english: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft

sentences.english: We booked a package tour to Italy for our honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 我们预订了一个去意大利的包价旅游，作为我们的蜜月旅行。

sentences.english: Package tours are convenient because they include transportation, accommodation, and meals.
sentences.chinese: 包价旅游很方便，因为它们包括了交通、住宿和餐饮。

sentences.english: Some people prefer package tours because they want a hassle-free vacation.
sentences.chinese: 有些人更喜欢包价旅游，因为他们想要一个无忧无虑的假期。

detailed_translations.english: a tour where all the arrangements (such as travel, accommodation, and meals) are included in a single price

sentences.english: a tennis coach
sentences.chinese: 网球教练

sentences.english: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.chinese: 挪威国家队教练

detailed_translations.english: someone who trains a person or team in a sport
to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport

sentences.english: Off-road driving is a thrilling activity for adventure enthusiasts.
sentences.chinese: 越野驾驶对冒险爱好者来说是一项刺激的活动。

sentences.english: Many vehicles are specifically designed for off-road driving.
sentences.chinese: 许多车辆是专门为越野驾驶设计的。

detailed_translations.english: driving on unpaved surfaces such as dirt trails, rocks, sand, or mud

sentences.english: This vehicle is equipped with four-wheel drive for off-road capability.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车配备了四驱系统，适合越野行驶。

sentences.english: Four-wheel drive provides better traction on slippery surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 四驱系统在湿滑路面上能提供更好的抓地力。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle system that enables all four wheels to receive power from the engine

sentences.english: We took a guided tour in an overnight caravan.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘坐夜宿型旅行拖车参加了导游团。

sentences.english: The nomadic tribes live in caravans.
sentences.chinese: 游牧部落居住在拖车里。

detailed_translations.english: a covered wagon or a group of covered wagons used for traveling together, especially through desert or other remote areas

sentences.english: We need to catch an express train to reach the airport on time.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要乘坐快车才能准时到达机场。

sentences.english: The express train to the city center leaves every hour.
sentences.chinese: 开往市中心的快车每小时一班。

detailed_translations.english: a train that travels regularly between two places and usually makes fewer stops than other trains

sentences.english: I prefer to fly economy class for long-haul flights.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜欢长途飞行时乘坐经济舱。

sentences.english: Economy class tickets are usually more affordable than business class.
sentences.chinese: 经济舱机票通常比商务舱更实惠。

sentences.english: The seat in economy class is not as comfortable as in business class.
sentences.chinese: 经济舱的座位不如商务舱舒适。

detailed_translations.english: the class of travel with the lowest fares, offering fewer comforts than first class or business class

sentences.english: We spent our vacation renting a charming cottage by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在湖边租了一间迷人的小屋度假。

sentences.english: The quaint cottage had a thatched roof and a cozy fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 这间古雅的小屋里有一个草顶和一个舒适的壁炉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小屋； 别墅； 乡间小屋
detailed_translations.english: a small house, typically in the countryside, often used as a holiday home

sentences.english: He put the innkeeper's daughter to work as a maid.
sentences.chinese: 他把客栈老板的女儿安排去做女佣。

sentences.english: They stopped at a small inn for the night.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一家小客栈停留过夜。

detailed_translations.english: a place that provides accommodation for travelers, typically with a restaurant and public room

name: B & B
trans: 提供床铺和早餐的旅店

sentences.english: We stayed at a cozy B & B near the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在靠近海滩的一个舒适的家庭旅馆住了下来。

sentences.english: The B & B provided a homey atmosphere and excellent breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 这家家庭旅馆提供了温馨的氛围和美味的早餐。

detailed_translations.chinese: （提供住宿和早餐的）家庭旅馆；民宿
detailed_translations.english: a small hotel offering accommodation and a breakfast

sentences.english: We stayed in a small cabin by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在湖边住了一个小木屋。

sentences.english: The cabin had a cozy fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 这个木屋里有一个舒适的壁炉。

sentences.english: They built a cabin in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们在森林里建了一个小木屋。

detailed_translations.english: a small room or building, especially one used for accommodation in a forest or on a ship

sentences.english: The next place on our itinerary was Sedona.
sentences.chinese: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 行程表； 旅行路线， 旅行计划
detailed_translations.english: a plan or list of the places you will visit on a journey

sentences.english: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system.
sentences.chinese: 大堡礁是世界上最大的珊瑚礁系统。

sentences.english: Divers and snorkelers often visit the Great Barrier Reef to explore its vibrant marine life.
sentences.chinese: 潜水和浮潜爱好者经常参观大堡礁以探索其丰富多彩的海洋生物。

sentences.english: The Great Barrier Reef is located off the coast of Queensland, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 大堡礁位于澳大利亚昆士兰州海岸外。

detailed_translations.english: a vast system of coral reefs off the northeast coast of Australia

sentences.english: The Sydney Opera House is a world-famous performing arts center located in Sydney, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼歌剧院是位于澳大利亚悉尼的世界著名表演艺术中心。

sentences.english: The distinctive sail-like design of the Sydney Opera House has made it an iconic landmark.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼歌剧院独特的帆状设计使其成为一座标志性的地标。

detailed_translations.english: a famous building in Sydney, Australia, known for its unique sail-like architecture and used for performances

sentences.english: Stonehenge is one of the most famous prehistoric sites in the world.
sentences.chinese: 巨石阵是世界上最著名的史前遗址之一。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have studied Stonehenge for centuries to understand its purpose.
sentences.chinese: 考古学家已经研究了几个世纪巨石阵的用途。

sentences.english: Stonehenge is believed to have been built by Neolithic people between 3000 and 2000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 人们相信巨石阵是由新石器时代的人们在公元前3000年至2000年间建造的。

detailed_translations.english: a prehistoric monument in England consisting of a large circle of standing stones

sentences.english: We plan to go camping in the mountains this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划这个周末去山里露营。

sentences.english: They went camping by the lake and enjoyed the fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 他们在湖边露营，享受着新鲜空气。

sentences.english: Go camping is a great way to disconnect from daily life.
sentences.chinese: 去露营是摆脱日常生活的好方法。

detailed_translations.english: to spend a night or more in a tent or other shelter in the countryside, especially as a recreational activity

sentences.english: We spent the day exploring the wild-life zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了一整天时间探索野生动物园。

sentences.english: The wild-life zoo offers a unique opportunity to see rare animals up close.
sentences.chinese: 野生动物园提供了一个近距离观察稀有动物的独特机会。

detailed_translations.english: animals that live in the wild; creatures native to a particular habitat

sentences.english: We spent the afternoon relaxing on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在海滩上度过了下午的时光，放松身心。

sentences.english: The beach is crowded with tourists during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的时候，海滩上挤满了游客。

sentences.english: The children built sandcastles on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在海滩上堆沙堡。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow strip of sand or pebbles bordering the sea or a lake

sentences.english: We drove along the coast for hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们在海岸线上开车了好几个小时。

sentences.english: The view from the coast is breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 从海岸线上看到的景色令人叹为观止。

sentences.english: They built a house near the coast.
sentences.chinese: 他们在靠近海岸线的地方盖了一栋房子。

detailed_translations.english: the land along the edge of a sea or ocean
to move smoothly and easily along a surface, often with a lack of effort

sentences.english: We spent the day hiking in Yosemite National Park.
sentences.chinese: 我们在优胜美地国家公园度过了整天的时间。

sentences.english: The Great Barrier Reef is a protected national park.
sentences.chinese: 大堡礁是一个受保护的国家公园。

sentences.english: Many national parks offer guided tours for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家公园为游客提供导游服务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 国家公园； 国家公园
detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is kept natural and protected by the government

sentences.english: We booked a charter flight to avoid the crowded commercial airlines.
sentences.chinese: 我们预订了包机航班以避免拥挤的客机。

sentences.english: The company arranged a charter flight for the executives to travel to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 公司为高管安排了包机前往会议。

detailed_translations.english: a flight booked in advance for a specific group of people

sentences.english: Cats and dogs are common domestic animals.
sentences.chinese: 猫和狗是常见的家养动物。

sentences.english: Many people keep domestic animals as pets.
sentences.chinese: 许多人把家养动物当作宠物。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has been tamed and kept by humans

sentences.english: He packed his sleeping bag and prepared for the camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 他打包了他的睡袋，准备去露营。

sentences.english: A good sleeping bag can keep you warm even in freezing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的睡袋即使在零下低温也能让你保持温暖。

sentences.english: She chose a lightweight sleeping bag for her backpacking adventure.
sentences.chinese: 她为她的背包旅行选择了一个轻便的睡袋。

detailed_translations.english: a portable bed used for camping or sleeping outdoors
