sentences.english: The recreation office organizes various activities for employees to enjoy during their free time.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐办公室组织各种活动，供员工在空闲时间享受。

sentences.english: You can find the recreation office on the second floor of the main building.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在主楼的二楼找到娱乐办公室。

detailed_translations.chinese: 娱乐； 消遣； 休憩
detailed_translations.english: activity that is done for enjoyment and relaxation

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

sentences.english: I love going mountain biking on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢周末去山地自行车骑行。

sentences.english: Mountain bikes are designed for off-road cycling.
sentences.chinese: 山地自行车是为越野骑行设计的。

detailed_translations.english: a bicycle designed for riding on rough terrain

sentences.english: She was carrying two large panniers on her back.
sentences.chinese: 她背上背着两个大行囊。

sentences.english: The old cart had two wooden panniers attached to the sides.
sentences.chinese: 旧车两边各有一个木制行囊。

detailed_translations.english: a bag or case for carrying clothes and other things when traveling

sentences.english: She carried her backpack on her back while hiking in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 她在山里徒步时背着背包。

sentences.english: Make sure your backpack is packed with all the necessary items for the trip.
sentences.chinese: 确保你的背包里装了旅行所需的所有物品。

sentences.english: He bought a new backpack for his upcoming camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 他为即将到来的露营旅行买了一个新背包。

detailed_translations.english: a bag used for carrying books, clothes, food, etc., especially when traveling or going to school

sentences.english: I couldn’t find your number in the telephone directory.
sentences.chinese: 我在电话簿上找不到你的电话号码。

sentences.english: a new business directory
sentences.chinese: 新的商业名录

detailed_translations.chinese: 人名地址录； 号码簿
detailed_translations.english: a book or list of names, facts etc, usually arranged in alphabetical order

sentences.english: He is known as the loudest snorer in the house.
sentences.chinese: 他是家里最响亮的打鼾者。

sentences.english: The constant snoring kept me awake all night.
sentences.chinese: 持续不断的打鼾让我整夜无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: a person who snores

sentences.english: a dinner reservation
sentences.chinese: 预订晚餐

sentences.english: Customers are advised to make seat reservations well in advance.
sentences.chinese: 建议顾客提前订座。

detailed_translations.chinese: 保留意见， 存疑； 预定， 预订
detailed_translations.english: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: We will not cancel your holiday less than eight weeks before the scheduled departure date .
sentences.chinese: 离预定出发日期少于八周，度假行程将不能取消。

detailed_translations.english: to plan that something will happen at a particular time
a list that shows the times that buses, trains etc leave or arrive at a particular place

sentences.english: It is unlikely that the marine industry will fare any better in September.
sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something fares well or badly, you are referring to the degree of success they achieve in a particular situation or activity
the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

sentences.english: There is a vacant seat available at the front of the bus.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车前部有一个空座位。

sentences.english: Please check if there are any vacant seats left for the concert.
sentences.chinese: 请确认音乐会上是否还有空座位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空的；未被占用的；虚位的
detailed_translations.english: not occupied or used

sentences.english: There will be an extra charge for expedited shipping.
sentences.chinese: 加急快递将产生额外费用。

sentences.english: Please note that there is an extra charge for using a credit card.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，使用信用卡将产生额外费用。

detailed_translations.english: an additional cost or fee

sentences.english: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

sentences.english: We will commence the tour at the museum entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我们将从博物馆入口开始游览。

sentences.english: The ceremony will commence the tour of the new facility.
sentences.chinese: 仪式将标志着新设施游览的开始。

detailed_translations.english: to begin something, especially officially or after a delay

sentences.english: a special school for mentally handicapped children
sentences.chinese: 弱智儿童特殊学校

detailed_translations.chinese: 残废的， 有生理缺陷的
detailed_translations.english: if someone is handicapped, a part of their body or their mind has been permanently injured or damaged. Some people think that this word is offensive.

sentences.english: She uses a wheelchair for mobility.
sentences.chinese: 她使用轮椅来行动。

sentences.english: The hospital has accessible parking for wheelchair users.
sentences.chinese: 这家医院有为轮椅使用者提供的无障碍停车位。

sentences.english: He won a race in a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在轮椅上赢得了一场比赛。

detailed_translations.english: a chair with wheels, used by someone who cannot walk

sentences.english: ...an exhibition of expressionist art.
sentences.chinese: …一场印象主义艺术展览会。

detailed_translations.english: a show of paintings, photographs, or other objects that people can go to see

sentences.english: Reproduction is essential for the continuation of a species.
sentences.chinese: 繁殖对物种的延续至关重要。

sentences.english: Many plants reproduce through seeds.
sentences.chinese: 许多植物通过种子进行繁殖。

sentences.english: The reproduction of fish in these rivers is threatened by pollution.
sentences.chinese: 这些河流中的鱼类繁殖受到污染的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: the process of producing offspring or copies

sentences.english: ...stone sculptures of figures and animals.
sentences.chinese: …人物及动物石雕。

detailed_translations.english: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist

sentences.english: Make sure you have all your diving gear before you enter the water.
sentences.chinese: 在进入水中之前，确保你拥有所有的潜水装备。

sentences.english: The instructor checked the diver's gear to ensure everything was secure.
sentences.chinese: 教练检查了潜水员的装备，以确保一切都很安全。

sentences.english: Proper diving gear is essential for a safe underwater exploration.
sentences.chinese: 适当的潜水装备对于安全的 underwater exploration 是必不可少的。

detailed_translations.english: equipment used for diving, such as masks, snorkels, and scuba gear

sentences.english: The Amazon rain forest is home to a incredible variety of plant and animal species.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊雨林是无数植物和动物物种的家园。

sentences.english: Many indigenous communities rely on the rain forest for their livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 许多原住民社区依赖雨林维持生计。

sentences.english: Deforestation in the rain forest has serious environmental consequences.
sentences.chinese: 雨林的砍伐对环境产生了严重的后果。

detailed_translations.english: a forest in a tropical climate that is characterized by high rainfall, with lush vegetation and a rich diversity of species

sentences.english: Reading is a popular leisure activity for many people.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是许多人受欢迎的休闲活动。

sentences.english: Hiking is a great leisure activity that allows you to enjoy nature.
sentences.chinese: 远足是一项很棒的休闲活动，让你能够享受大自然。

sentences.english: Playing a musical instrument is a fulfilling leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 弹奏乐器是一项令人满足的休闲活动。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you do in your free time for enjoyment

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 面部的侧影，侧面轮廓；传略，人物简介
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

sentences.english: The vineyard produces some of the finest wines in the region.
sentences.chinese: 这个葡萄园出产该地区一些最优质的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: We took a tour of the vineyard to learn about the wine-making process.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了葡萄园，学习了葡萄酒酿造过程。

detailed_translations.english: a plot of ground where grapes are grown for wine

sentences.english: We need to lodge a complaint about the poor service.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要就糟糕的服务提出投诉。

sentences.english: The guests decided to lodge at a local B&B.
sentences.chinese: 客人决定在当地一家民宿住宿。

sentences.english: He was able to lodge his argument very convincingly.
sentences.chinese: 他能够非常有说服力地陈述自己的论点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提出（投诉、建议等）； 陈述； 住宿
detailed_translations.english: to officially state or present a complaint, request, or argument

detailed_translations.chinese: 小屋； 旅舍； （英国议院的）下议院议员
detailed_translations.english: a small house or cabin, especially one used for hunting or as a holiday accommodation; a place where people can stay for a short time; the lower house of the British Parliament

sentences.english: I need to apply for a visa extension before my current one expires.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在当前签证到期前申请签证延期。

sentences.english: The embassy processing my visa extension request was very efficient.
sentences.chinese: 处理我签证延期申请的大使馆非常高效。

sentences.english: You must provide proof of your financial stability to support your visa extension application.
sentences.chinese: 你必须提供证明你的财务稳定以支持你的签证延期申请。

detailed_translations.english: an extension of the period for which a visa is valid

sentences.english: The non-open time is when the store is not available for customers.
sentences.chinese: 非营业时间是商店不对顾客开放的时间。

sentences.english: Employees are required to work during non-open time for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 员工需要在非营业时间工作以进行维护。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非营业时间；不开放的时间
detailed_translations.english: the period when a business or establishment is not open to the public

sentences.english: We booked our vacation package through a travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过旅行社预订了我们的假期套餐。

sentences.english: The travel agency helped us arrange flights, hotels, and tours.
sentences.chinese: 旅行社帮我们安排了航班、酒店和旅游行程。

detailed_translations.english: a business that arranges trips, accommodation, and tours for people traveling to other places

sentences.english: Please provide the flight number for your reservation.
sentences.chinese: 请提供您的预订航班号。

sentences.english: The flight number is clearly displayed on your boarding pass.
sentences.chinese: 航班号清楚地显示在您的登机牌上。

detailed_translations.english: a set of numbers assigned to an aircraft for identification on a particular flight

sentences.english: I need to book the ticket for the flight tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我需要为明天预订机票。

sentences.english: You can book the ticket online through the website.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过网站在线预订机票。

sentences.english: Have you booked the ticket yet?
sentences.chinese: 你预订机票了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to reserve a seat, ticket, or room for a future journey or event

sentences.english: I used my credit card to pay for the online purchase.
sentences.chinese: 我使用信用卡支付了在线购物。

sentences.english: Make sure to check your credit card statement for any unauthorized charges.
sentences.chinese: 务必检查您的信用卡账单，以查看是否有未经授权的消费。

sentences.english: Many hotels accept credit cards as a form of payment.
sentences.chinese: 许多酒店接受信用卡作为支付方式。

detailed_translations.english: a plastic card issued by a bank allowing the holder to borrow money up to a certain limit

sentences.english: I have an Irish passport.
sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.english: They need to check that your passport is in order.
sentences.chinese: 他们要检查一下你的护照是否有效。

detailed_translations.chinese: 护照； 途径， 路子， 手段
detailed_translations.english: a small official document that you get from your government, that proves who you are, and which you need in order to leave your country and enter other countries

sentences.english: You need a driving license to operate a motor vehicle legally.
sentences.chinese: 您需要驾驶执照才能合法驾驶机动车辆。

sentences.english: He went to the DMV to renew his driving license.
sentences.chinese: 他去了DMV去续签他的驾驶执照。

detailed_translations.english: a document issued by a government authority that allows a person to drive a vehicle on public roads

sentences.english: The chairman’s term of office has already expired.
sentences.chinese: 主席任期已满。

detailed_translations.english: if a period of time when someone has a particular position of authority expires, it ends

sentences.english: Please check in at the reception desk when you arrive.
sentences.chinese: 当你到达时，请到接待台办理登记手续。

sentences.english: We checked in online before our flight.
sentences.chinese: 我们在航班起飞前在线办理了登机手续。

detailed_translations.english: to register at a hotel, airport, or other place when you arrive

sentences.english: The plane will take off at 8:00 AM.
sentences.chinese: 飞机将在上午8点起飞。

sentences.english: She took off her hat when she entered the room.
sentences.chinese: 她进入房间时脱下了帽子。

sentences.english: The joke took off and the audience laughed.
sentences.chinese: 这个笑话很受欢迎，观众们笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to leave the ground and begin to fly; to remove something, especially clothes; to become very popular quickly

sentences.english: The ship finally landed on the shore after a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 经过漫长的旅程，船终于在岸边靠岸了。

sentences.english: They landed the plane safely despite the bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气恶劣，他们还是安全着陆了飞机。

sentences.english: She landed a job as a software engineer right after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她毕业后很快就找到了一份软件工程师的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the solid part of the earth's surface; a country
to bring (an aircraft) down to the ground; to succeed in getting (a job, opportunity, etc.)
to come down to the ground, especially of an aircraft

sentences.english: We stayed at a cozy motel by the highway during our road trip.
sentences.chinese: 在公路边的一家舒适汽车旅馆住了一晚，这是我们公路旅行期间的选择。

sentences.english: The motel had a swimming pool and a restaurant, making it a convenient stop for travelers.
sentences.chinese: 这家汽车旅馆有一个游泳池和一家餐厅，是旅行者方便的停留点。

detailed_translations.english: a type of hotel where rooms are often located directly above or next to parking spaces for cars

sentences.english: We stayed at a cheap hostel near the city center.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在市中心附近的一家廉价旅舍。

sentences.english: The hostel has a cozy common room where guests can relax.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅舍有一个舒适的公共休息室，客人们可以在那里放松。

sentences.english: Hostels are a popular option for budget travelers.
sentences.chinese: 旅舍是预算旅行者的热门选择。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people can stay and eat fairly cheaply

sentences.english: We spent the afternoon exploring the art museum.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了整个下午探索艺术博物馆。

sentences.english: The natural history museum has many interesting exhibits.
sentences.chinese: 自然历史博物馆有许多有趣的展品。

sentences.english: She works as a curator at the local museum.
sentences.chinese: 她在当地博物馆担任策展人。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which objects of historical or scientific interest are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: a souvenir shop
sentences.chinese: 纪念品商店

detailed_translations.english: an object that you buy or keep to remind yourself of a special occasion or a place you have visited

sentences.english: We spent the afternoon exploring the art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了一个下午时间探索美术馆。

sentences.english: The art gallery houses a collection of modern paintings.
sentences.chinese: 这家美术馆收藏了一批现代绘画作品。

sentences.english: She is a renowned artist exhibited in the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位著名的艺术家，其作品曾在该美术馆展出。

detailed_translations.english: a place where art objects (such as paintings, sculptures, or photographs) are displayed to the public

sentences.english: I enjoy hiking in the mountains on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在周末去山区徒步。

sentences.english: Hiking is a great way to stay fit and explore nature.
sentences.chinese: 徒步是一种保持健康和探索自然的好方法。

sentences.english: They went hiking even though it was raining.
sentences.chinese: 尽管在下雨，他们还是去徒步了。

detailed_translations.english: a long, vigorous walk, typically in the countryside
to go on a long, vigorous walk, typically in the countryside

sentences.english: He decided to hitch-hike across the country to save money.
sentences.chinese: 他决定搭便车穿越整个国家以节省开支。

sentences.english: Be careful when hitch-hiking; it can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 搭便车时要小心，这可能很危险。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搭便车；搭乘免费交通工具
detailed_translations.english: to travel by getting free rides from people you meet while traveling

sentences.english: I love going surfing on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在周末冲浪。

sentences.english: She spent her holiday learning how to surf.
sentences.chinese: 她花了假期学习冲浪。

sentences.english: Surfing is a great way to stay fit.
sentences.chinese: 冲浪是保持健康的好方法。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or sport of riding on the waves of the sea or a lake on a surfboard

sentences.english: She loves spending her weekends skiing in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在周末去山里滑雪。

sentences.english: We went skiing last winter and had a fantastic time.
sentences.chinese: 我们去年冬天去滑雪，玩得非常开心。

sentences.english: Skiing is a great way to stay fit and enjoy nature.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪是保持健康和享受自然的好方法。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or sport of moving on skis

sentences.english: As a bag-packer, you need to be efficient at handling multiple items quickly.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名包装工，你需要快速高效地处理多个物品。

sentences.english: The bag-packer carefully placed each item in its designated spot to ensure everything was secure.
sentences.chinese: 包装工小心翼翼地将每个物品放置在指定的位置，以确保一切安全。

detailed_translations.english: a person who packs items into bags or boxes, often in a retail or shipping context

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平台， 站台； 纲领
detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

sentences.english: Eating too many calories can lead to weight gain.
sentences.chinese: 摄入过多卡路里会导致体重增加。

sentences.english: This food is high in calories.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物卡路里含量很高。

sentences.english: A calorie is a unit of energy.
sentences.chinese: 卡路里是能量单位。

detailed_translations.english: a unit of energy; specifically, the amount of energy required to raise the temperature of one gram of water by one degree Celsius

sentences.english: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.english: Like fibre, calcium binds with fat molecules and helps flush them out through the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 像纤维、钙可以和脂肪分子结合，帮助他们彻底的通过肠道。

sentences.english: What you eat and drink, from childhood on, is critical to the amount of calcium in your bones.
sentences.chinese: 从儿童时期起你吃的和喝的东西对于你的骨骼里的钙质量就有重大的影响。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that helps to form teeth, bones, and  chalk  . It is a chemical  element  : symbol Ca

sentences.english: Sodium is an essential mineral for the body.
sentences.chinese: 钠是人体必需的矿物质。

sentences.english: Table salt is primarily composed of sodium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 食盐主要由氯化钠组成。

sentences.english: Excessive intake of sodium can lead to high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 摄入过多的钠会导致高血压。

detailed_translations.english: a soft silvery-white metallic element that occurs in nature combined in compounds such as sodium chloride

sentences.english: This cake is very high in fat.
sentences.chinese: 这个蛋糕脂肪含量很高。

sentences.english: Eating too much fat can lead to health problems.
sentences.chinese: 摄入过多脂肪会导致健康问题。

sentences.english: Saturated fat is considered less healthy than unsaturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 饱和脂肪被认为不如不饱和脂肪健康。

detailed_translations.english: a substance found in animal and vegetable tissues and consisting largely of triglycerides, especially when present in excess in the body as a source of energy storage
relating to or denoting fat
full-figured; plump

sentences.english: Eating a balanced diet ensures you get enough vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 均衡饮食可以确保你摄入足够的维生素。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is important for a healthy immune system.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C对健康的免疫系统很重要。

sentences.english: Some people take vitamin supplements to boost their health.
sentences.chinese: 有些人服用维生素补充剂来增强他们的健康。

detailed_translations.english: an organic compound essential in small amounts for animal nutrition

sentences.english: Protein is essential for the growth and repair of tissues in the body.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质是身体组织和器官生长与修复所必需的。

sentences.english: Many people include lean meats, fish, eggs, and dairy products in their diet to get enough protein.
sentences.chinese: 许多人通过食用瘦肉、鱼类、蛋类和乳制品来确保摄入足够的蛋白质。

sentences.english: Plant-based sources of protein include beans, lentils, nuts, and seeds.
sentences.chinese: 植物性蛋白质来源包括豆类、扁豆、坚果和种子。

detailed_translations.english: a nutrient that humans and animals need to grow and stay healthy; a substance found in foods such as meat, milk, eggs, and beans

sentences.english: Dietary fiber is essential for maintaining digestive health.
sentences.chinese: 膳食纤维对维持消化健康至关重要。

sentences.english: Many people do not consume enough dietary fiber in their daily diet.
sentences.chinese: 许多人日常饮食中摄入的膳食纤维不足。

sentences.english: Soluble dietary fiber can help lower cholesterol levels.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维有助于降低胆固醇水平。

detailed_translations.english: a type of food component that is not digested by the body but helps in digestion and bowel movement

sentences.english: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical or food that provides what is needed for plants or animals to live and grow

sentences.english: a bowl of breakfast cereal
sentences.chinese: 一碗早餐麦片

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷类植物； 谷物； 谷类食物

sentences.english: He was diagnosed with a lung infection after showing symptoms of cough and fever.
sentences.chinese: 在出现咳嗽和发烧症状后，他被诊断出患有肺部感染。

sentences.english: The patient needed to take antibiotics to treat the lung infection.
sentences.chinese: 患者需要服用抗生素来治疗肺部感染。

sentences.english: Smoking can increase the risk of developing a lung infection.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会增加患上肺部感染的风险。

detailed_translations.english: an infection that affects the lungs

sentences.english: The long meeting induced a feeling of drowsiness in everyone.
sentences.chinese: 漫长的会议让每个人都感到困倦。

sentences.english: She fought off drowsiness by keeping her eyes open wide.
sentences.chinese: 她通过睁大眼睛来抵抗困意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 困倦；嗜睡；昏昏欲睡的状态
detailed_translations.english: a state of feeling sleepy and lacking energy

sentences.english: Yellow Fever is a serious disease transmitted by mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 黄热病是一种由蚊子传播的严重疾病。

sentences.english: Vaccination is the primary means of preventing Yellow Fever.
sentences.chinese: 接种疫苗是预防黄热病的主要手段。

detailed_translations.english: an acute infectious disease caused by the Yellow Fever virus, characterized by fever, jaundice, and bleeding

sentences.english: Getting a vaccine injection is important for preventing infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 接种疫苗对于预防传染病非常重要。

sentences.english: She received a vaccine injection at the clinic yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天在诊所接种了疫苗。

sentences.english: The nurse administered the vaccine injection quickly and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 护士迅速而有效地接种了疫苗。

detailed_translations.english: the administration of a vaccine by injection

sentences.english: I went to thechemist's to buy some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 我去药店买了一些阿司匹林。

sentences.english: She works part-time at achemist's near her home.
sentences.chinese: 她在她家附近的一家药店做兼职。

detailed_translations.english: a shop where drugs and chemicals are sold, or where a chemist works

sentences.english: She works at a local pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家当地药店工作。

sentences.english: He needs to visit the pharmacy to get his prescription filled.
sentences.chinese: 他需要去药店取药。

sentences.english: The pharmacy stocks a wide range of over-the-counter medications.
sentences.chinese: 这家药店备有各种非处方药。

detailed_translations.english: a place where medicines are sold or prepared

sentences.english: I went to the drug store to buy some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 我去药店买了一些阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The drug store is closed on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 药店在星期天关门。

sentences.english: She works part-time at a local drug store.
sentences.chinese: 她在当地的药店做兼职。

detailed_translations.english: a shop that sells drugs and other remedies, cosmetics, and sometimes general merchandise

sentences.english: The optician performed a thorough optic examination to check my vision.
sentences.chinese: 验光师进行了一次彻底的眼科检查来检查我的视力。

sentences.english: It's important to have an annual optic examination to monitor eye health.
sentences.chinese: 每年进行一次眼科检查以监测眼睛健康是很重要的。

detailed_translations.english: a medical examination of the eyes to assess vision and eye health

sentences.english: She has a severe allergy to peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 她对花生严重过敏。

sentences.english: Many people suffer from seasonal allergies.
sentences.chinese: 许多人患有季节性过敏。

sentences.english: He discovered his allergy to dairy in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他在童年时发现了自己对乳制品的过敏。

detailed_translations.english: an immune response to a substance that is normally harmless

sentences.english: Leprosy is a chronic infectious disease caused by the Mycobacterium leprae bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 麻风病是由麻风分枝杆菌引起的一种慢性传染病。

sentences.english: Early detection and treatment of leprosy can prevent disability and disfigurement.
sentences.chinese: 早期发现和治疗麻风病可以预防残疾和畸形。

detailed_translations.english: a chronic infectious disease that primarily affects the skin, nerves, and mucous membranes, caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium leprae

sentences.english: Over 500 people died during last year’s flu epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 去年流感大暴发期间有五百多人死亡。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of cases of a disease that happen at the same time

sentences.english: chronic arthritis
sentences.chinese: 慢性关节炎

sentences.english: chronic asthma
sentences.chinese: 慢性哮喘

sentences.english: chronic heart disease
sentences.chinese: 慢性心脏病

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢性的； 积习难改的
detailed_translations.english: a chronic disease or illness is one that continues for a long time and cannot be cured

sentences.english: It's always a good precaution to check the weather forecast before going hiking.
sentences.chinese: 在去远足之前检查天气预报总是个不错的选择。

sentences.english: The company took precautions to ensure the safety of its employees during the pandemic.
sentences.chinese: 为了在疫情期间确保员工的安全，公司采取了预防措施。

sentences.english: Wearing a seatbelt is a necessary precaution while driving.
sentences.chinese: 开车时系安全带是必要的预防措施。

detailed_translations.english: an action taken to prevent something unpleasant or dangerous from happening

sentences.english: I caught the flu last week and couldn't go to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上周得了流感，没能去上班。

sentences.english: She has a high fever, she might have the flu.
sentences.chinese: 她发高烧了，可能是得了流感。

sentences.english: Make sure to get a flu shot every year to prevent the flu.
sentences.chinese: 确保每年都接种流感疫苗，以预防流感。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious disease caused by influenza viruses

sentences.english: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious disease that is like a very bad cold

sentences.english: He suffered from a painful stomach ulcer for months.
sentences.chinese: 他忍受着胃溃疡的痛苦数月之久。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed medication to help heal the ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 医生开了药物来帮助溃疡愈合。

detailed_translations.english: a break in the skin or a sore that does not heal easily

sentences.english: an appointment at an outpatient clinic
sentences.chinese: 门诊预约

detailed_translations.english: a place, often in a hospital, where medical treatment is given to people who do not need to stay in the hospital

sentences.english: He was rushed to the hospital after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 车祸后，他被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: She works as a nurse in the local hospital.
sentences.chinese: 她在这家当地医院当护士。

sentences.english: The hospital has a special ward for children.
sentences.chinese: 这家医院有一个专门为儿童设立的病房。

detailed_translations.english: an institution providing medical and surgical treatment

sentences.english: Make sure you have a first aid kit in your car.
sentences.chinese: 确保你的车里有一个急救包。

sentences.english: The teacher showed the students how to use items from the first aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 老师向学生们展示了如何使用急救包里的物品。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of medical supplies for treating injuries or illnesses

sentences.english: You should go to the first aid station if you feel unwell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感觉不舒服，应该去急救站。

sentences.english: The first aid station is located near the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 急救站位于主入口附近。

sentences.english: The nurse at the first aid station provided me with a bandage.
sentences.chinese: 急救站的护士给了我一个绷带。

detailed_translations.english: a place where medical treatment is given for injuries or sudden illnesses

sentences.english: She has been a very patient teacher to her students.
sentences.chinese: 她对学生非常耐心，是一位很好的老师。

sentences.english: We need to be patient while waiting for the results.
sentences.chinese: 在等待结果的时候，我们需要有耐心。

sentences.english: He showed great patience under difficult circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 在困难的情况下，他表现出极大的耐心。

detailed_translations.english: able to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry
the capacity to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry

sentences.english: I need to schedule an appointment with the dentist for a check-up.
sentences.chinese: 我需要预约牙医做一次检查。

sentences.english: The dentist will examine your teeth and provide necessary treatments.
sentences.chinese: 牙医会检查你的牙齿并提供必要的治疗。

sentences.english: My dentist recommended that I floss daily to maintain good oral hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 我的牙医建议我每天使用牙线来保持良好的口腔卫生。

detailed_translations.english: a medical doctor who specializes in dental care

sentences.english: The heat and the champagne made him feel dizzy .
sentences.chinese: 高温和香槟酒使他感到眩晕。

sentences.english: She started to suffer from dizzy spells (= a short period when you feel dizzy ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始感到一阵阵的眩晕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 头晕目眩的， 眩晕的； 人头晕的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unable to stand steadily, for example because you are looking down from a high place or because you are ill

sentences.english: I have a terrible headache.
sentences.chinese: 我头疼得厉害。

sentences.english: He got a headache from reading in the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他在明亮的阳光下看书，结果得了头痛。

sentences.english: She often suffers from headaches.
sentences.chinese: 她经常头痛。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in the head

sentences.english: He had a dry cough that kept him awake at night.
sentences.chinese: 他整夜都被一阵干咳搞得无法入睡。

sentences.english: She mentioned that she had a cough for the past week.
sentences.chinese: 她提到她已经咳嗽了一周了。

sentences.english: The doctor suggested drinking warm honey lemon tea to soothe his cough.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议喝温热的蜂蜜柠檬茶来缓解他的咳嗽。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden, often repeated, expulsion of air from the lungs, typically with a characteristic sound
to make a sudden, often repeated, expulsion of air from the lungs, typically with a characteristic sound

sentences.english: The heart beats with a steady pulse.
sentences.chinese: 心脏以稳定的脉搏跳动。

sentences.english: We could feel the pulse of the city through the vibrant nightlife.
sentences.chinese: 通过充满活力的夜生活，我们感受到了城市的脉搏。

sentences.english: The pulse sensor measures the heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 脉搏传感器测量心率。

detailed_translations.english: a regular rhythmical beat or throbbing, typically one per second

detailed_translations.chinese: 脉动；有脉搏；有节奏地跳动
detailed_translations.english: to beat or move with a regular rhythm

sentences.english: High blood pressure can lead to serious health problems if left untreated.
sentences.chinese: 如果忽视治疗，高血压会导致严重的健康问题。

sentences.english: The doctor measured my blood pressure to check my cardiovascular health.
sentences.chinese: 医生测量了我的血压以检查我的心血管健康。

sentences.english: It's important to monitor your blood pressure regularly.
sentences.chinese: 定期监测血压非常重要。

detailed_translations.english: the pressure of circulating blood on the walls of blood vessels, especially arteries

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.chinese: 症状； 征候， 征兆
detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

sentences.english: He had a sore throat for several days due to the cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 由于天气寒冷，他喉咙痛了好几天。

sentences.english: I recommend gargling with salt water to relieve a sore throat.
sentences.chinese: 我建议用盐水漱口来缓解喉咙痛。

detailed_translations.english: a pain or discomfort in the throat

sentences.english: He has a stuffed nose from the cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 他因为寒冷的天气而鼻子堵塞。

sentences.english: She went to the doctor because her stuffed nose wouldn't clear up.
sentences.chinese: 她去看医生，因为她的鼻子堵塞了很久都没有好转。

detailed_translations.english: blocked or stopped up, often with mucus

sentences.english: He has a running nose and a slight fever.
sentences.chinese: 他流鼻涕，还有点发烧。

sentences.english: The constant running nose was a sign of a cold.
sentences.chinese: 不断的流鼻涕是感冒的迹象。

detailed_translations.english: a continuous flow of mucus from the nose, often due to a cold or allergy

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

sentences.english: We are trying to cut the price of prescription drugs .
sentences.chinese: 我们正努力降低处方药的价格。

sentences.english: a repeat prescription
sentences.chinese: 重复处方

detailed_translations.chinese: 处方， 药方； 开处方， 开药方
detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper on which a doctor writes what medicine a sick person should have, so that they can get it from a  pharmacist

sentences.english: Penicillin is one of the most important discoveries in modern medicine.
sentences.chinese: 青霉素是现代医学中最重要的发现之一。

sentences.english: He was successfully treated with penicillin for his bacterial infection.
sentences.chinese: 他用青霉素成功地治疗了他的细菌感染。

detailed_translations.english: a group of antibiotics derived from molds of the Penicillium family, used to treat various bacterial infections

sentences.english: He took an aspirin for his headache.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了一片阿司匹林来缓解头痛。

sentences.english: Aspirin can help reduce pain and inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 阿司匹林可以帮助减轻疼痛和炎症。

detailed_translations.english: a white crystalline drug used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever

sentences.english: Antibiotics are commonly used to treat bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素通常用于治疗细菌感染。

sentences.english: It's important to complete the full course of antibiotics as prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 按照医嘱完成整个抗生素疗程非常重要。

sentences.english: Some people experience side effects when taking antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 有些人服用抗生素时会感到副作用。

detailed_translations.english: medicines that are used to treat infections caused by bacteria

sentences.english: She was taken to the hospital ward.
sentences.chinese: 她被送往医院病房。

sentences.english: The children's ward was full of noisy patients.
sentences.chinese: 儿科病房里挤满了吵闹的病人。

sentences.english: He served on the front ward during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争中服役于前线战壕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病房； 警戒区； (军队)战壕
detailed_translations.english: a room in a hospital where patients receive treatment or stay overnight
an area of a military operation

sentences.english: The life expectancy in developed countries is generally higher than in developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 发达国家的预期寿命通常高于发展中国家。

sentences.english: Improvements in healthcare have increased life expectancy significantly over the past century.
sentences.chinese: 过去一个世纪，医疗保健的改善显著提高了预期寿命。

detailed_translations.english: the average number of years a person is expected to live

sentences.english: He suffered from hay fever every summer.
sentences.chinese: 他每年夏天都会患上花粉症。

sentences.english: She took antihistamines to relieve her hay fever symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 她服用抗组胺药来缓解她的花粉症症状。

detailed_translations.english: an allergic reaction to pollen, typically causing sneezing, a runny nose, and itchy eyes

sentences.english: She took a sleeping pill before going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡觉前吃了一片安眠药。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed a pill for his headache.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他开了一片药来治疗头痛。

sentences.english: He popped a vitamin pill every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早上都吃一片维生素药丸。

detailed_translations.english: a small ball of medicine used in medicine

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

sentences.english: She uses fresh herbs to season her dishes.
sentences.chinese: 她用新鲜的香草来调味她的菜肴。

sentences.english: This soup is flavored with a variety of herbs.
sentences.chinese: 这汤用多种香草调味。

sentences.english: The garden is full of different herbs.
sentences.chinese: 花园里长满了各种香草。

detailed_translations.english: a plant or plant part valued for its medicinal, aromatic, or culinary properties

sentences.english: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
sentences.chinese: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

detailed_translations.chinese: 胶囊； 航天舱， 太空舱
detailed_translations.english: a plastic container shaped like a very small tube with medicine inside that you swallow whole

sentences.english: She applied the ointment to the minor cuts on her skin.
sentences.chinese: 她将药膏涂抹在皮肤上的小伤口上。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed an ointment to relieve the skin irritation.
sentences.chinese: 医生开了一种药膏来缓解皮肤刺激。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth, greasy substance used for medicinal purposes

sentences.english: She took a cough lozenge to soothe her throat.
sentences.chinese: 她含了一块润喉糖来舒缓喉咙的咳嗽。

sentences.english: The lozenge dissolved slowly in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 那块糖在 他的嘴里慢慢溶解了。

detailed_translations.english: a small, solid piece of medicine or candy, usually square or diamond-shaped, that dissolves slowly in the mouth

sentences.english: She drizzled some maple syrup over her pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 她在松饼上淋了一些枫糖浆。

sentences.english: The recipe calls for honey instead of syrup.
sentences.chinese: 这个食谱要求用蜂蜜代替糖浆。

detailed_translations.english: a thick, sweet liquid, especially one made by boiling sugar with water or fruit juice

sentences.english: Please drop the package at the front desk.
sentences.chinese: 请把包裹放在前台。

sentences.english: The rain began to drop heavily.
sentences.chinese: 雨开始大了起来。

sentences.english: He decided to drop the course because it was too difficult.
sentences.chinese: 他决定退掉这门课，因为它太难了。

detailed_translations.english: to let something fall to the ground
to fall in drops
to decrease or fall in amount or value
to withdraw from a course, competition, or activity

sentences.english: He got sick after eating contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 他在吃了受污染的食物后生病了。

sentences.english: It's important to store food properly to avoid food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 妥善储存食物以避免食物中毒非常重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物中毒；食物中毒事件
detailed_translations.english: a disease caused by eating food that is contaminated with harmful bacteria, viruses, or parasites

sentences.english: The problems in our schools do not have a simple remedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

detailed_translations.english: a way of dealing with a problem or making a bad situation better
to deal with a problem or improve a bad situation

sentences.english: I need to check up on my doctor's appointment.
sentences.chinese: 我需要查一下我的医生预约。

sentences.english: Let's check up on the progress of the project.
sentences.chinese: 我们来了解一下项目的进展情况。

sentences.english: You should check up on the weather forecast before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 你应该在离开前查一下天气预报。

detailed_translations.english: to look at or examine something to see if it is correct or in good condition

sentences.english: He has been suffering from insomnia for the past few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他过去几周一直受到失眠的困扰。

sentences.english: Lack of sleep can lead to insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足可能导致失眠。

sentences.english: She tried various remedies to cure her insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 她尝试了各种方法来治愈她的失眠。

detailed_translations.english: a sleep disorder characterized by difficulty falling asleep, staying asleep, or both

sentences.english: I have a touch of arthritis in the wrist.
sentences.chinese: 我的手腕有轻微关节炎。

detailed_translations.english: a disease that causes the joints of your body to become swollen and very painful

sentences.english: She hoped to sleep off her fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 她希望睡一觉之后会消除疲劳。

sentences.english: I have got over my weakness and fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了。

sentences.english: Everyone has analogy fatigue at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，人人都有类比疲劳。

detailed_translations.english: very great tiredness

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
a bend in a river or road

sentences.english: He suffered a bad ankle sprain during the basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他在篮球比赛中扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.english: Make sure to rest the sprained wrist for at least a week.
sentences.chinese: 确保扭伤的手腕至少休息一周。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to a joint or muscle caused by being twisted or pulled

sentences.english: Do your ankles swell at night?
sentences.chinese: 你的脚踝晚上会肿吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 膨胀； 增长， 增强
detailed_translations.english: If something such as a part of your body swells, it becomes larger and rounder than normal

sentences.english: He suffered a bad bruise on his leg after the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他在摔倒后腿部受了很严重的青紫。

sentences.english: She put ice on the bruise to reduce the swelling.
sentences.chinese: 她把冰敷在青紫上以减少肿胀。

detailed_translations.english: a discoloured patch on the skin caused by a blow

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment

sentences.english: The doctor made a diagnosis of pneumonia based on the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 医生根据症状诊断出患者患上了肺炎。

sentences.english: The early diagnosis helped the patient receive timely treatment.

sentences.english: The doctor adjusted the patient's dosage based on their response to the medication.

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.

sentences.english: He sent in a bill for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 他为维修工作提交了一张账单。

sentences.english: Please take a note of this important information.
sentences.chinese: 请记下这个重要信息。

sentences.chinese: 他在平板电脑上快速记录了一下。

sentences.english: He decided to coin a new term to describe the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 他决定创造一个新术语来描述这一现象。

sentences.english: The ancient coins were worth a lot of money to collectors.

sentences.chinese: 我需要写一张支票来支付房租。

sentences.chinese: 他从支票簿上直接开出一张支票来支付账单。

sentences.english: You can use traveler's cheques for secure transactions while traveling abroad.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用旅行支票在海外旅行时进行安全的交易。

detailed_translations.english: a preprinted check issued by a bank that can be replaced if lost or stolen

sentences.english: I used my credit card to pay for the online purchase.
sentences.chinese: 我使用信用卡支付了在线购物费用。

sentences.english: Always check your credit card statement for any unauthorized charges.
sentences.chinese: 始终检查您的信用卡账单，以查看是否有未经授权的收费。

sentences.english: Many hotels accept credit cards as a form of payment.

sentences.english: He is a master of his craft.
sentences.chinese: 他是他手艺的大师。

sentences.english: She has mastered the art of negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 她精通谈判的艺术。

sentences.english: The master of the house greeted his guests warmly.
sentences.chinese: 这家之主热情地欢迎了他的客人。

to gain complete control or skill over something

sentences.english: She needs a valid Visa to travel to the USA.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有效的签证才能前往美国。

sentences.english: The company helped him apply for a work Visa.

sentences.chinese: 我用我的美国运通卡支付了酒店房费。

sentences.chinese: 每位员工都应该在公司保持一个专业的账户。

sentences.chinese: 请登录您的账户以查看您的余额。

sentences.chinese: 央行决定降低利率以刺激经济。

sentences.chinese: 我需要去ATM取点现金。

sentences.chinese: 我们抵押贷款买了这所房子。

sentences.chinese: 渔网用于在水中捕鱼。

sentences.chinese: …一个能保证到10月份为止获得10.4%毛利或7.8%净利的固定利率账户。

sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬被认为是一个钻石王老五。

sentences.chinese: 政府给予当地社区的特别优惠帮助促进了他们的经济发展。

sentences.chinese: 我使用了一张汇票来支付在线购买的商品，因为我的信用卡被拒了。

sentences.chinese: 邮局职员帮我填写了汇票表格。

sentences.chinese: 我只得贷款买车。

sentences.english: It’ll be years before we’ve paid off the loan.
sentences.chinese: 我们要过好几年才能还清贷款。

sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转移； 调动； 转车， 换乘

sentences.chinese: 公共休息室是一个让学生可以放松和社交的地方。

sentences.chinese: 我们整个晚上都在公共休息室度过，看电影和聊天。

sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

sentences.english: The students gathered in the dining hall for their lunch break.
sentences.chinese: 学生们在食堂聚集着吃午饭。

sentences.chinese: 这所大学的食堂提供多种食物选择。

sentences.english: Conclusions Using HACCP method in refectory obtained good effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论：在学校食堂应用HACCP管理是有效的。

sentences.english: Do you know if hereabout have preferable refectory for Western - style food.
sentences.chinese: 你知道附近有比较好的西餐厅吗?。

sentences.english: There is no denying that the qualities of food in our refectory have gone from bad to worse .
sentences.chinese: 不可否认的，我们学校食堂食物的质量已经每况愈下。

sentences.chinese: 我们昨晚享用了丰盛的自助晚餐。

sentences.english: The hotel offers a buffet breakfast every morning.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店每天早上提供自助早餐。

sentences.chinese: 我们在海滩上烧烤。

detailed_translations.english: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors

sentences.chinese: 我们在继续旅程前，在一个小吃吧停下来快速吃了点东西。

sentences.chinese: 公园附近的小吃吧在周末总是很拥挤。

sentences.english: She loves to eat a candy bar as a snack.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在零食时间吃一块糖果棒。

sentences.english: The movie lasted for three hours, and they passed the time by eating candy bars.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影持续了三个小时，他们通过吃糖果棒来打发时间。

sentences.chinese: 我从自动售货机买了一包零食。

sentences.english: The vending machine is located in the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 自动售货机位于大堂。

sentences.english: You can buy drinks, snacks, and even some electronics in a vending machine.
sentences.chinese: 在自动售货机里你可以买饮料、零食，甚至一些电子产品。

sentences.chinese: 辣鸡非常受顾客欢迎。

sentences.english: She likes to add a spicy sauce to her pasta.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在意大利面中加入辣酱。

sentences.chinese: 在紧张的情况下保持冷静很重要。

sentences.english: The weather is too hot for outdoor activities today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的天气太热，不适合户外活动。

sentences.english: He became hot and sweaty after running the marathon.
sentences.chinese: 跑完马拉松后，他变得很热，汗流浃背。

sentences.english: The lecturer delivered an engaging presentation on quantum physics.
sentences.chinese: 这位讲师就量子物理学做了一场引人入胜的演讲。

sentences.english: She is a renowned lecturer in the field of medieval history.

sentences.chinese: 她是加州大学的助理教授。

sentences.english: As an assistant professor, he teaches undergraduate and graduate courses.

sentences.chinese: 她是这所大学的副教授。

sentences.english: As an associate professor, he publishes research articles regularly.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名副教授，他定期发表研究文章。

sentences.english: The professor gave an insightful lecture on quantum physics.
sentences.chinese: 这位教授就量子物理学发表了一场富有见地的讲座。

sentences.english: She is a renowned professor of history at the university.

sentences.english: The professor recommended several books for further reading.
sentences.chinese: 这位教授推荐了几本供进一步阅读的书籍。

sentences.chinese: 学校辅导员为学生提供指导和帮助。

sentences.english: She helps students with academic planning and career exploration.

sentences.chinese: …在一家工厂担任监督员的一项全职工作。

sentences.english: The career advisor helped me explore different career options.

sentences.english: She provided valuable insights on how to advance my career.

sentences.english: Please report the issue to the customer service department.

sentences.english: The company hired a financial adviser to help with their budget.
sentences.chinese: 公司聘请了一位财务顾问来帮助他们处理预算。

sentences.english: You should consult an academic adviser before choosing your courses.

detailed_translations.english: a person who gives expert advice or opinion

sentences.chinese: 利昂·沙利文既是我的导师，也是我的朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 导师； 顾问， 指导者
detailed_translations.english: an experienced person who advises and helps a less experienced person

sentences.chinese: 赫尔穆特•科尔，德国前总理

sentences.chinese: 布什总统

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统， 校长， 会长， 主席

sentences.english: Cupellation is a process used in metallurgy to separate noble metals like gold and silver from base metals.
sentences.chinese: 火法精炼是一种冶金工艺，用于将金、黄铜矿等贵金属从基金属中分离。

sentences.english: The cupellation process involves heating the impure metal in a cupel to burn off the impurities.
sentences.chinese: 火法精炼过程涉及将杂质金属加热到坩埚中，以烧掉杂质。

sentences.english: We discussed the terms of the contract for hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了数小时讨论合同的条款。

sentences.english: This software is available for a limited term only.
sentences.chinese: 此软件仅限有限期限使用。

sentences.english: The blue-book provides a comprehensive overview of the company's financial performance.

sentences.chinese: 期末考试将在下周一举行。

sentences.english: She took an aptitude test to see if she was suited for the programming job.
sentences.chinese: 她参加了一个能力测试，看看自己是否适合这份编程工作。

sentences.english: Our school provides modern teaching facilities to enhance the learning experience.

sentences.chinese: 英语熟练程度对于国际商业交流至关重要。

sentences.chinese: 补充阅读材料通常提供给学生，以增强他们对主题的理解。

sentences.chinese: 研究方法是稳健且设计良好的。

sentences.chinese: 她解释了她教学方法的原理。

sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.chinese: …埃里克·鲁滨逊教授的系列讲座。

sentences.chinese: 会议厅里挤满了参加国际研讨会的与会者。

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

sentences.english: I had to take out a loan to buy my car.
sentences.chinese: 我只得贷款买车。

sentences.english: It’ll be years before we’ve paid off the loan.
sentences.chinese: 我们要过好几年才能还清贷款。

sentences.chinese: 研究生助学金每月提供一笔津贴，以帮助支付生活费用。

sentences.english: Tuition fees can be a significant financial burden for many families.
sentences.chinese: 学费对许多家庭来说是一个巨大的经济负担。

sentences.english: She decided to pursue higher education and enrolled in a university for tuition.
sentences.chinese: 她决定继续深造，并进入了一所大学接受教育。

sentences.english: The school offers financial aid to students who cannot afford the full tuition.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校为那些负担不起全部学费的学生提供助学金。

sentences.english: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 她最新出版的作品是一部优秀的学术著作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奖学金； 学问， 学识
detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given to someone by an educational organization to help pay for their education

sentences.english: They formed a close fellowship based on shared interests.
sentences.chinese: 他们基于共同的兴趣形成了一个紧密的伙伴关系。

sentences.english: The fellowship provided financial support for his research.

sentences.chinese: 学生会全年组织各种活动。

sentences.english: She is an active member of her university's student union.
sentences.chinese: 她是她所在大学学生会的一名活跃成员。

sentences.english: The student union provides a platform for students to voice their concerns.

sentences.chinese: 离预定出发日期少于八周，度假行程将不能取消。

sentences.chinese: 学校时间表贴在学校的办公室墙上。

sentences.chinese: 课程安排旨在提供对该主题的全面理解。

sentences.chinese: 国家防御是政府的首要任务。

sentences.english: The team's defense was strong, preventing the opponent from scoring.
sentences.chinese: 球队的防守很坚固，阻止了对手得分。
