sentences.english: The syllabus outlines the topics covered in the course.
sentences.chinese: 教学大纲概述了课程涵盖的主题。

sentences.english: Please make sure to read the syllabus before the first class.
sentences.chinese: 请在第一节课前确保阅读教学大纲。

sentences.english: She distributed the syllabus to all the students at the beginning of the semester.
sentences.chinese: 她在学期开始时将教学大纲分发给所有学生。

detailed_translations.english: a document that outlines the subjects and topics to be studied in a course or class

sentences.english: Each child had participated in extracurricular activities at school.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都参加了学校的课外活动。

detailed_translations.english: extracurricular activities are not part of the course that a student is doing at a school or college

sentences.english: This beginner course is designed for those who have no prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这个入门课程是为那些对该主题一无所知的人设计的。

sentences.english: In this beginner course, you will learn the basics of programming.
sentences.chinese: 在这个入门课程中，你将学习编程的基础知识。

sentences.english: Are you looking for a beginner course to improve your language skills?
sentences.chinese: 你是在寻找一个入门课程来提高你的语言技能吗？

detailed_translations.english: a course designed for people who are new to a particular subject or skill

sentences.english: This foundation course provides essential knowledge for beginners in the field.
sentences.chinese: 这门基础课程为该领域的初学者提供了必备知识。

sentences.english: Students are required to complete a foundation course before enrolling in advanced modules.
sentences.chinese: 学生在注册高级模块之前必须完成基础课程。

detailed_translations.english: a course designed to give students basic knowledge or skills in a particular subject

sentences.english: This basic course covers the fundamental concepts of computer programming.
sentences.chinese: 这门基础课程涵盖了计算机编程的基本概念。

sentences.english: She enrolled in a basic course to improve her Spanish language skills.
sentences.chinese: 她报名参加了一个基础课程来提高她的西班牙语水平。

detailed_translations.english: a course designed to introduce you to the basics of a subject

sentences.english: This elementary course covers the basics of computer programming.
sentences.chinese: 这门基础课程涵盖了计算机编程的基础知识。

sentences.english: She is taking an elementary course in Spanish to improve her language skills.
sentences.chinese: 她正在参加一门西班牙语基础课程以提高她的语言技能。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the simplest or earliest stage of something
a fundamental principle or ingredient of a subject or system

sentences.english: The primary course of action is to contact the customer service department.
sentences.chinese: 主要的行动方案是联系客户服务部门。

sentences.english: This course is designed for beginners and covers the primary concepts of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程专为初学者设计，涵盖了该学科的基本概念。

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的；第一位的；初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important or fundamental; the first stage or level

sentences.english: Students in the secondary course are required to complete a research project.
sentences.chinese: 在 secondary course 的学生需要完成一个研究项目。

sentences.english: The secondary course offers a variety of electives to suit different interests.
sentences.chinese: secondary course 提供了多种选修课以满足不同的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: a course of study designed for students in secondary school

sentences.english: This intermediate course is designed for students who have basic knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这门中级课程是为具有该学科基础知识的学生设计的。

sentences.english: Participants in the intermediate course will gain a deeper understanding of the core concepts.
sentences.chinese: 中级课程参与者将更深入地理解核心概念。

detailed_translations.english: more advanced than beginner level but less advanced than advanced level
a course suitable for students who have some previous knowledge or experience

sentences.english: This advanced course is designed for students with a solid foundation in the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这门高级课程是为具有该学科扎实基础的学生设计的。

sentences.english: Enrolling in this advanced course will significantly enhance your expertise.
sentences.chinese: 注册这门高级课程将显著增强您的专业知识。

detailed_translations.english: more advanced than the average or usual level
a course that is more difficult than a basic or introductory course

sentences.english: Mathematics is a compulsory course for all students in this school.
sentences.chinese: 数学是这所学校所有学生的必修课。

sentences.english: English literature is a compulsory course in the first year of university.
sentences.chinese: 英语文学是大学第一年的必修课。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强制的； 义务的； 必修的
detailed_translations.english: required or obligatory; must be taken or done

sentences.english: Mathematics is a required course for all science majors.
sentences.chinese: 数学是所有科学专业的必修课。

sentences.english: English literature is a required course in this program.
sentences.chinese: 英语文学是该项目的一门必修课。

detailed_translations.english: obligatory or necessary

sentences.english: This is an optional course, but it's highly recommended for beginners.
sentences.chinese: 这门是选修课，但强烈建议初学者选修。

sentences.english: You have the option to choose either the optional course or the mandatory one.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择选修课或必修课。

detailed_translations.english: not compulsory; available if you want to take it

sentences.english: I decided to take an elective course in graphic design to broaden my skill set.
sentences.chinese: 我决定选修一门平面设计课程来扩展我的技能范围。

sentences.english: Elective courses allow students to specialize in areas of their interest.
sentences.chinese: 选修课程允许学生在他们感兴趣的领域专业化。

detailed_translations.english: a course that you can choose to take, instead of compulsory courses

sentences.english: This university offers a range of specialized courses tailored to different career paths.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学提供了一系列针对不同职业道路的专业课程。

sentences.english: She decided to take a specialized course in digital marketing to enhance her skills.
sentences.chinese: 她决定参加一个数字营销的专业课程以提升她的技能。

detailed_translations.english: relating to a particular subject or field of study
a course of study that focuses on a specific subject or area

sentences.english: This is a general course designed for beginners.
sentences.chinese: 这是一门为初学者设计的普通课程。

sentences.english: She decided to take a general course in computer science.
sentences.chinese: 她决定选修一门计算机科学的普通课程。

detailed_translations.english: a course that covers a broad range of topics within a subject

sentences.english: Why do you like your major?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么喜欢你的主修科目?。

sentences.english: What are your major subject and minor subject?
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和辅修科目是什么?。

detailed_translations.english: very large or important, when compared to other things or people of a similar kind
the main subject that a student studies at college or university

sentences.english: She works part-time to keep her studies minor.
sentences.chinese: 她做兼职以保持她的学业为副业。

sentences.english: The minor league team has a loyal fan base.
sentences.chinese: 这支小联盟球队拥有忠实的球迷。

sentences.english: He chose a minor in music alongside his major in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 他在主修工程的同时，选择了音乐作为辅修。

detailed_translations.english: less important or significant than something else

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅修科目；小专业；次要角色
detailed_translations.english: a subject or area of study that someone follows in addition to their main subject

sentences.english: Archaeology helps us understand our past by studying ancient artifacts and structures.
sentences.chinese: 考古学通过研究古代文物和建筑，帮助我们了解过去。

sentences.english: The archaeologists discovered an ancient city that was once a thriving trade center.
sentences.chinese: 考古学家发现了一座曾经繁荣的贸易中心古城。

detailed_translations.english: the study of past human life and culture by examining artifacts, structures, and other physical remains

sentences.english: Modern architecture often emphasizes minimalism and functionality.
sentences.chinese: 现代建筑常常强调极简主义和功能性。

sentences.english: The architecture of the city reflects its rich history.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市的建筑反映了其丰富的历史。

sentences.english: Sustainable architecture is becoming increasingly important.
sentences.chinese: 可持续建筑正变得越来越重要。

detailed_translations.english: the art or practice of designing and constructing buildings

sentences.english: Astronomy is the scientific study of celestial objects and phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 天文学是研究天体和现象的科学。

sentences.english: Many ancient civilizations developed sophisticated astronomical systems.
sentences.chinese: 许多古代文明发展了复杂的天文系统。

sentences.english: Studying astronomy helps us understand the universe better.
sentences.chinese: 学习天文学帮助我们更好地理解宇宙。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of celestial objects and phenomena, including stars, planets, galaxies, and the universe as a whole

sentences.english: Agriculture is the cultivation of land and the rearing of animals for food and other products.
sentences.chinese: 农业是种植土地和饲养动物以获取食物和其他产品的行业。

sentences.english: Modern agriculture relies heavily on technology and machinery to increase productivity.
sentences.chinese: 现代农业高度依赖技术和机械来提高生产力。

sentences.english: The government provides subsidies to support agriculture in the country.
sentences.chinese: 政府提供补贴以支持该国的农业。

detailed_translations.english: the practice of cultivating land and raising crops and livestock

sentences.english: Geography helps us understand the physical features of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 地理学帮助我们理解地球的物理特征。

sentences.english: She is studying geography at university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学学习地理。

sentences.english: Geography includes the study of climate, population, and cultures.
sentences.chinese: 地理学包括对气候、人口和文化的学习。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地理学； 地理； 地形
detailed_translations.english: the study of the physical features of the Earth and its atmosphere, and of human activities as they interact with the environment

sentences.english: Geology helps us understand the Earth's structure and history.
sentences.chinese: 地质学帮助我们理解地球的结构和历史。

sentences.english: The geologist studied the rock samples to identify the minerals.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家研究了岩石样本以识别矿物。

sentences.english: Plate tectonics is a fundamental concept in geology.
sentences.chinese: 板块构造是地质学中的一个基本概念。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the Earth's physical structure and substance, its history, and the processes that act on it

sentences.english: Chemistry is the scientific study of matter and its properties.
sentences.chinese: 化学是研究物质及其性质的科学。

sentences.english: She has a strong interest in chemistry and plans to major in it at university.
sentences.chinese: 她对化学有浓厚的兴趣，并计划在大学主修化学。

sentences.english: The chemistry experiment requires precise measurements and careful observation.
sentences.chinese: 这个化学实验需要精确的测量和仔细的观察。

detailed_translations.chinese: 化学；化学性质；化学反应
detailed_translations.english: the science that deals with substances, the changes they undergo, and the energy they release

sentences.english: Microbiology is the study of microorganisms, including bacteria, viruses, and fungi.
sentences.chinese: 微生物学是研究微生物的学科，包括细菌、病毒和真菌。

sentences.english: The field of microbiology has made significant advancements in understanding diseases and developing treatments.
sentences.chinese: 微生物学领域在理解疾病和开发治疗方法方面取得了显著的进步。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of microorganisms, including their biology, ecology, and pathology

sentences.english: Marine biology is the scientific study of organisms in marine environments.
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学是研究海洋环境中生物的科学。

sentences.english: Many marine biologists conduct research on coral reefs, which are biodiversity hotspots.
sentences.chinese: 许多海洋生物学家对珊瑚礁进行研究，珊瑚礁是生物多样性热点地区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海洋生物学； 海洋生物研究
detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of life in the sea or in other bodies of water

sentences.english: Her hospitality made the guests feel very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的热情好客让客人们感到非常受欢迎。

sentences.english: The hotel is known for its exceptional hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以其卓越的热情好客而闻名。

sentences.english: Hospitality is a key aspect of the tourism industry.
sentences.chinese: 热情好客是旅游业的重点方面。

detailed_translations.english: the practice of being friendly and helpful to guests and strangers

sentences.english: Hotel Management is a field that requires a strong understanding of customer service.
sentences.chinese: 酒店管理是一个需要深刻理解客户服务的领域。

sentences.english: Effective Hotel Management involves coordinating various departments to ensure smooth operations.
sentences.chinese: 有效的酒店管理涉及协调各个部门以确保顺利运营。

sentences.english: A Hotel Manager must be skilled in budgeting and financial planning.
sentences.chinese: 酒店经理必须擅长预算和财务规划。

detailed_translations.english: the administration and operation of a hotel
to oversee and direct the activities of a hotel

sentences.english: Botany is the scientific study of plants.
sentences.chinese: 植物学是研究植物的科学。

sentences.english: She majors in botany at the university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学主修植物学。

sentences.english: Botany includes the study of plant structure, growth, reproduction, and distribution.
sentences.chinese: 植物学研究植物的结构、生长、繁殖和分布。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of plants and their life processes

sentences.english: Zoology is the scientific study of animals and their behavior.
sentences.chinese: 动物学是研究动物及其行为的科学。

sentences.english: Many students find zoology fascinating because it involves observing wild animals in their natural habitats.
sentences.chinese: 许多学生发现动物学非常吸引人，因为它涉及在自然栖息地观察野生动物。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of animals and their behavior, physiology, development, and classification

sentences.english: Ecology is the study of how organisms interact with their environment.
sentences.chinese: 生态学研究生物体与其环境相互作用的方式。

sentences.english: The disruption of ecosystems has significant consequences for biodiversity.
sentences.chinese: 生态系统的破坏对生物多样性有重大影响。

sentences.english: Many people are concerned about climate change and its impact on ecology.
sentences.chinese: 许多人关注气候变化及其对生态的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the relationships between living things and their environment

sentences.english: Electronics have revolutionized the way we communicate and access information.
sentences.chinese: 电子设备彻底改变了我们交流和获取信息的方式。

sentences.english: She is studying electronics at the technical college.
sentences.chinese: 她在技术学院学习电子技术。

sentences.english: This electronics component is essential for the circuit to function properly.
sentences.chinese: 这个电子元件对于电路正常工作至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: the branch of technology that deals with the behavior of electrons and uses their properties to develop and manufacture useful devices

sentences.english: Mathematics is the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns.
sentences.chinese: 数学是研究数字、形状和模式的一门学科。

sentences.english: She is very good at Mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 她非常擅长数学。

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers, amounts, and shapes

sentences.english: Maths is a subject that requires practice and understanding.
sentences.chinese: 数学是一门需要练习和理解的主题。

sentences.english: She is very good at Maths and often helps her classmates with problems.
sentences.chinese: 她非常擅长数学，经常帮助同学解决问题。

sentences.english: Many students find Maths difficult, but with dedication, it can be mastered.
sentences.chinese: 许多学生觉得数学很难，但只要有决心，就可以掌握它。

detailed_translations.english: a subject in schools that involves the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns

sentences.english: Statistics is used to analyze data and make informed decisions.
sentences.chinese: 统计学用于分析数据并做出明智的决策。

sentences.english: The statistics show a significant increase in sales this quarter.
sentences.chinese: 数据显示本季度销售额显著增长。

sentences.english: She has a degree in statistics and works as a data analyst.
sentences.chinese: 她拥有统计学学位，是一名数据分析师。

detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of collecting and analyzing data, typically to draw conclusions.

sentences.english: Genetics is the study of genes, heredity, and the variation of organisms.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学是研究基因、遗传以及生物体变异的科学。

sentences.english: Many diseases have a genetic component.
sentences.chinese: 许多疾病都有遗传因素。

sentences.english: The field of genetics has made significant advancements in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域近年来取得了显著的进展。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of genes and heredity

sentences.english: Physiology is the scientific study of the functions of living organisms and their parts.
sentences.chinese: 生理学是研究生物及其各部分功能的科学。

sentences.english: Understanding human physiology is crucial for developing effective medical treatments.
sentences.chinese: 理解人体生理学对于开发有效的治疗方法至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: the branch of biology that deals with the functions and activities of living organisms and their parts

sentences.english: Literature review is an essential part of academic research.
sentences.chinese: 文献综述是学术研究的必要部分。

sentences.english: She is a passionate reader of classic literature.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位热爱经典文学的读者。

sentences.english: The course includes the study of modern literature.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程包括现代文学的研究。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学； 文献； 文学作品
detailed_translations.english: the body of written works of a language, period, or country, and the study of such works

sentences.english: Philosophy helps us to question the fundamental nature of reality and existence.
sentences.chinese: 哲学帮助我们质疑现实和存在的根本性质。

sentences.english: He pursued philosophy throughout his academic career.
sentences.chinese: 他在整个学术生涯中追求哲学。

sentences.english: The philosophy of the company emphasizes teamwork and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 公司的哲学强调团队合作和创新。

detailed_translations.english: the study of fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, values, reason, mind, and language

sentences.english: History is the study of past events.
sentences.chinese: 历史是过去事件的研究。

sentences.english: She has a strong interest in world history.
sentences.chinese: 她对世界历史有浓厚的兴趣。

sentences.english: The history of this company dates back to 1950.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司的历史可以追溯到1950年。

detailed_translations.english: the study of past events, especially in human affairs

sentences.english: Art can be a powerful form of expression.
sentences.chinese: 艺术可以是一种强大的表达形式。

sentences.english: She is studying art at the university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学学习艺术。

sentences.english: The museum has a collection of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆收藏了现代艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: the expression or application of creative skill and imagination, typically in a visual form such as painting or sculpture

sentences.english: Sociology helps us understand the structure and dynamics of human society.
sentences.chinese: 社会学帮助我们理解人类社会的结构和动态。

sentences.english: Sociologists study social institutions, social relationships, and social change.
sentences.chinese: 社会学家研究社会制度、社会关系和社会变迁。

sentences.english: Sociology provides insights into how social factors influence individual behavior.
sentences.chinese: 社会学提供了对社会因素如何影响个体行为的洞察。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of human society, social relationships, and social institutions

sentences.english: Linguistics is the scientific study of language and its structure.
sentences.chinese: 语言学是语言及其结构的科学研究。

sentences.english: Linguists analyze the sounds, words, and grammar of languages.
sentences.chinese: 语言学家分析语言的声音、词汇和语法。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of language and its structure, including the study of phonetics, morphology, syntax, and semantics

sentences.english: Psychology helps us understand human behavior and mental processes.
sentences.chinese: 心理学帮助我们理解人类行为和心智过程。

sentences.english: Many students major in psychology to pursue a career in counseling.
sentences.chinese: 许多学生主修心理学以追求咨询职业。

sentences.english: The psychologist conducted experiments to study the effects of stress on memory.
sentences.chinese: 心理学家进行实验以研究压力对记忆的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the mind and behavior

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神病学； 心理治疗
detailed_translations.english: the treatment of mental illness or distress

sentences.english: Engineering is the application of scientific and mathematical principles to design and build structures, machines, systems, and processes.
sentences.chinese: 工程学是将科学和数学原理应用于设计和建造结构、机器、系统和过程。

sentences.english: Civil engineering involves the design and construction of infrastructure such as roads, bridges, and buildings.
sentences.chinese: 土木工程涉及基础设施（如道路、桥梁和建筑物）的设计和建造。

sentences.english: Mechanical engineering focuses on the design, analysis, and manufacture of mechanical systems.
sentences.chinese: 机械工程专注于机械系统的设计、分析和制造。

detailed_translations.english: the discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and mechanical systems

sentences.english: He is a successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位成功的商人。

sentences.english: The company is expanding its business into new markets.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在将其业务扩展到新市场。

sentences.english: She started her own business after working for a large corporation.
sentences.chinese: 她在为一家大公司工作后开始了自己的事业。

detailed_translations.english: activities related to buying and selling goods or services
a person's job or regular activity, especially one that they do to earn money

sentences.english: The law requires drivers to have a valid license.
sentences.chinese: 法律要求司机必须有有效的驾照。

sentences.english: She studied law at university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学学习法律。

sentences.english: The law protects the rights of citizens.
sentences.chinese: 法律保护公民的权利。

detailed_translations.english: a system of rules that are created and enforced by a government to regulate behaviour or maintain order

sentences.english: Economics is the study of how societies allocate scarce resources to satisfy unlimited wants.
sentences.chinese: 经济学是研究社会如何配置稀缺资源以满足无限需求的社会科学。

sentences.english: The principles of economics can help us understand the behavior of markets and the role of government.
sentences.chinese: 经济学的原理可以帮助我们理解市场行为和政府的作用。

sentences.english: Microeconomics focuses on the behavior of individual consumers and firms.
sentences.chinese: 微观经济学关注个体消费者和企业的行为。

sentences.english: Macroeconomics examines the economy as a whole, including inflation, unemployment, and economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 宏观经济学研究整个经济体，包括通货膨胀、失业和经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: the social science that studies the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services
the state of financial health of a person, organization, or country

sentences.english: Finance is the management of money and other assets.
sentences.chinese: 金融是管理金钱和其他资产的行为。

sentences.english: The finance department is responsible for managing the company's budget.
sentences.chinese: 财务部门负责管理公司的预算。

sentences.english: He studied finance at university to improve his career prospects.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学学习金融以改善他的职业前景。

detailed_translations.english: the management of money and other assets
the management of financial resources

sentences.english: Accounting is essential for managing a business's finances.
sentences.chinese: 会计对于管理企业的财务至关重要。

sentences.english: She is studying accounting at university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学学习会计。

sentences.english: The accounting department prepares monthly financial reports.
sentences.chinese: 会计部门准备每月财务报告。

detailed_translations.english: the system of recording and summarizing financial transactions and analyzing, verifying, and reporting the results

sentences.english: Banking regulations are designed to protect consumers.
sentences.chinese: 银行法规旨在保护消费者。

sentences.english: He went to the bank to deposit his paycheck.
sentences.chinese: 他去了银行存他的工资支票。

sentences.english: Online banking has made it easier to manage finances.
sentences.chinese: 网上银行让管理财务变得更容易。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people keep money and other valuables and where they can borrow money or take out loans
to put money into a bank account

sentences.english: Biochemistry is the study of the chemical processes within and relating to living organisms.
sentences.chinese: 生物化学是研究生命有机体内和相关的化学过程的一门学科。

sentences.english: Many important biological processes, such as photosynthesis and muscle contraction, are studied in biochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 许多重要的生物过程，如光合作用和肌肉收缩，都在生物化学中进行研究。

sentences.english: Biochemistry combines biology and chemistry to understand the molecular basis of life.
sentences.chinese: 生物化学结合生物学和化学，以理解生命的分子基础。

detailed_translations.english: the branch of chemistry concerned with the chemical processes and substances that occur in living organisms

sentences.english: Physics helps us understand the fundamental laws of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 物理学帮助我们理解宇宙的基本规律。

sentences.english: She is majoring in physics at the university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大学主修物理学。

sentences.english: The physics of this phenomenon is still not fully understood.
sentences.chinese: 这种现象的物理学原理尚不完全被理解。

detailed_translations.english: the science of matter, energy, and the interactions between them, especially at the level of atoms and subatomic particles

sentences.english: Anthropology helps us understand the diversity of human cultures.
sentences.chinese: 人类学帮助我们理解人类文化的多样性。

sentences.english: The anthropologist conducted fieldwork in remote villages to study local traditions.
sentences.chinese: 人类学家在偏远村庄进行实地考察以研究当地传统。

detailed_translations.english: the study of human societies, cultures, and their development

sentences.english: Science is the systematic study of the structure and behaviour of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment.
sentences.chinese: 科学是通过观察和实验系统地研究物质和自然世界结构和行为的学科。

sentences.english: She has a degree in science and works as a researcher.
sentences.chinese: 她拥有科学学位，是一名研究员。

sentences.english: Many people believe that science is the key to solving the world's problems.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为科学是解决世界问题的关键。

detailed_translations.english: the systematic study of the structure and behaviour of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment

sentences.english: The touch-screen information service provides quick access to real-time data.
sentences.chinese: 触摸屏信息服务提供对实时数据的快速访问。

sentences.english: Users can navigate the touch-screen information service with ease.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以轻松浏览触摸屏信息服务。

detailed_translations.english: a service that uses a touch screen to provide information to users

sentences.english: a loft extension
sentences.chinese: 增建的阁楼

detailed_translations.chinese: 伸展； 延长部分； 电话分机
detailed_translations.english: the process of making a road, building etc bigger or longer, or the part that is added

sentences.english: We need to renew our license before it expires.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在许可证到期前更新它。

sentences.english: The company decided to renew its contract with the supplier.
sentences.chinese: 公司决定与供应商续签合同。

sentences.english: She renewed her library membership online.
sentences.chinese: 她在线续订了她的图书馆会员资格。

detailed_translations.english: to make something new or fresh again; to extend the validity of something by paying for a new period

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 到期的， 预期的； 应有的， 应得的； 正当的
detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

sentences.english: an overdue gas bill
sentences.chinese: 逾期未付的煤气账单

sentences.english: The library books are overdue.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书过期未还。

sentences.english: The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.chinese: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过期未付的； 逾期的； 过度的， 过火的； 迟到的， 延误的
detailed_translations.english: not done, paid, returned etc by the time expected

sentences.english: Please check the date of expiry before using the product.
sentences.chinese: 在使用产品前请检查其有效期。

sentences.english: The medicine has expired on the date of expiry mentioned on the label.
sentences.chinese: 该药品已过标签上标注的有效期。

detailed_translations.english: the last date on which something can be used or sold

sentences.english: We decided to catalogue the old books under their respective titles for easier reference.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定根据各自的书名将旧书归类，以便于参考。

sentences.english: The librarian categorized the new arrivals under specific titles to maintain an organized system.
sentences.chinese: 图书管理员将新到图书按照特定标题归类，以保持系统的有序性。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange items into specific categories or lists

sentences.english: The author of this book is a renowned writer.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的作者是位著名的作家。

sentences.english: She is currently working on her next novel as the author.
sentences.chinese: 她正以作家的身份创作她的下一部小说。

detailed_translations.english: a person who writes books or articles or the creator of a work of art

sentences.english: romantic fiction
sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

sentences.english: Non-fiction books provide factual information about various subjects.
sentences.chinese: 非虚构类书籍提供了关于各种主题的事实信息。

sentences.english: She enjoys reading biographies, which are a type of non-fiction.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢阅读传记，传记是一种非虚构类作品。

detailed_translations.english: relating to facts or real events, rather than stories or imagination

sentences.english: The reference book section of the library contains many specialized dictionaries.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的参考书区包含许多专业词典。

sentences.english: You can find detailed information about historical events in the reference book section.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在参考书区找到关于历史事件的详细信息。

detailed_translations.english: a section of a library that contains books meant for research and study, not for borrowing

sentences.english: The encyclopedia contains information on almost every subject imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 这本百科全书包含了关于几乎所有可以想象到的主题的信息。

sentences.english: She used the encyclopedia to research her school project.
sentences.chinese: 她用百科全书来研究她的学校项目。

detailed_translations.chinese: 百科全书；百科全书式的人物
detailed_translations.english: a comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects, organized in alphabetical order

sentences.english: The world map in the atlas shows detailed geographical features.
sentences.chinese: 地图册中的世界地图展示了详细的地理特征。

sentences.english: She used the atlas to study for her geography exam.
sentences.chinese: 她使用地图册来复习地理考试。

detailed_translations.english: a book of maps showing geographical areas

sentences.english: We refer to the almanac to check the weather forecast for next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们查阅年历来查看下周的天气预报。

sentences.english: The old family almanac contains genealogical information dating back centuries.
sentences.chinese: 这本古老的家族年历包含了几百年前的家谱信息。

detailed_translations.english: a book giving information about daily and yearly events, weather forecasts, etc., for a particular year

sentences.english: The hard disk drive uses magnetically coded data to store information.
sentences.chinese: 硬盘驱动器使用磁编码数据来存储信息。

sentences.english: The passport contains magnetically coded information for security purposes.
sentences.chinese: 护照包含用于安全目的的磁编码信息。

detailed_translations.english: using magnetic codes to store or transmit information

sentences.english: The technician used a demagnetizer to demagnetize the metal parts before inspection.
sentences.chinese: 技术人员在使用前用退磁器对金属部件进行了退磁。

sentences.english: It is important to demagnetize electronic components to prevent interference.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止干扰，对电子元件进行退磁非常重要。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a magnet to lose its magnetic properties

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可获得的， 可得到的； 可用的； 有空的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

sentences.english: We apologize, but the item you requested is not in stock.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，您请求的商品没有库存。

sentences.english: Please check back later; we might have the product in stock by then.
sentences.chinese: 请稍后再来查看；我们可能到那时会有该产品库存。

sentences.english: All tickets for the concert are in stock and available for purchase.
sentences.chinese: 所有演唱会的门票都有库存，可以购买。

detailed_translations.english: to have something available for sale or use

sentences.english: He went back to stacking the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 他继续把货物摆上货架。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…叠成堆， 堆放于； 堆积， 堆起
detailed_translations.english: to put neat piles of things on something

sentences.english: The open shelf held a variety of books and decorative items.
sentences.chinese: 开放式书架上摆放着各种书籍和装饰品。

sentences.english: Please keep your belongings on the open shelf provided.
sentences.chinese: 请将您的物品放在提供的开放式书架上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开放式书架；敞开式搁板
detailed_translations.english: a shelf that is open to the public or not enclosed

sentences.english: Closed reserves are areas where certain activities are restricted for conservation purposes.
sentences.chinese: 封闭保护区是因保护目的而限制某些活动的区域。

sentences.english: The closed reserve is home to a variety of endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 封闭保护区是多种濒危物种的家园。

detailed_translations.english: not open to the public or to certain activities
a protected area where access is restricted for conservation

sentences.english: He is currently out on loan at a smaller club.
sentences.chinese: 他目前被租借到一家较小的俱乐部。

sentences.english: The young player was sent out on loan to gain experience.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻球员被租借出去以积累经验。

detailed_translations.english: to be sent to play for another team temporarily as part of an agreement

sentences.english: We need to check the reservation list before confirming the guests.
sentences.chinese: 在确认客人之前，我们需要检查预订名单。

sentences.english: Her name was not on the reservation list, so she couldn't stay at the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字不在预订名单上，所以她不能住在酒店。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement to keep a place or service for someone

sentences.english: ...a prospectus for a new issue of stock.
sentences.chinese: …新发行股票的招股说明书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 内容说明书， 简章， 简介
detailed_translations.english: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a company, college, or school, which gives details about it

sentences.english: He’s leafleting the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 他在向街区居民散发传单。

detailed_translations.english: to give leaflets to people

detailed_translations.chinese: 传单，散页印刷品；小册子
detailed_translations.english: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject

sentences.english: Forbes is a well-known American magazine that ranks wealthy individuals and companies.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯是一本著名的美国杂志，它对富裕的个人和企业进行排名。

sentences.english: The Forbes 400 list is highly regarded in the business world.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯400强名单在商界备受推崇。

detailed_translations.english: a widely read American magazine that ranks wealthy individuals and companies, and provides business news and analysis

sentences.english: The index page is the first page of a website.
sentences.chinese: 索引页是一个网站的首页。

sentences.english: Please look up the word in the index of the dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 请在字典的索引中查找这个单词。

sentences.english: The stock market index rose today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的股票市场指数上涨了。

detailed_translations.english: a list of items arranged in alphabetical or numerical order for easy reference
the first page of a book or other publication that lists the main topics and the page numbers where they can be found
a statistical measure that shows how a group of stocks or other assets are performing over time

sentences.english: The front of the house has a beautiful garden.
sentences.chinese: 房子的前面有一个美丽的花园。

sentences.english: She stood at the front of the line.
sentences.chinese: 她站在队伍的最前面。

sentences.english: The front page of the newspaper had an exciting story.
sentences.chinese: 报纸的头版有一个激动人心的故事。

detailed_translations.english: the forward part of the human body, from the shoulder to the chin
the side of a vehicle that faces forward
the part of a garment that covers the front of the body

sentences.english: The back cover of the book provides a brief summary of the story.
sentences.chinese: 书的封底提供了故事的一个简要概述。

sentences.english: She used the back cover to hide her notes during the test.
sentences.chinese: 她在考试时用封底来隐藏笔记。

detailed_translations.english: the back part of the cover of a book, magazine, etc.

sentences.english: Turn the page and fly into a world of adventure.
sentences.chinese: 翻过这一页，飞入一个充满冒险的世界。

sentences.english: She dreamed of flying high on the pages of her story.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想在自己的故事页上飞得高高的。

detailed_translations.english: to move through the air using wings or engines
an insect with wings that flaps rapidly

sentences.english: The leaf of the tree turned yellow in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 树的叶子在秋天变黄了。

sentences.english: He picked up a fallen leaf from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他从地上捡起一片落叶。

sentences.english: The chlorophyll in the leaf helps plants perform photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 叶绿素帮助植物进行光合作用。

detailed_translations.english: a flat, green structure on a plant that makes food through photosynthesis

sentences.english: The retrieval of lost data is crucial for business continuity.
sentences.chinese: 恢复丢失的数据对于业务连续性至关重要。

sentences.english: The library system provides efficient document retrieval services.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆系统提供高效的文档检索服务。

detailed_translations.english: the act of finding or recovering something that has been lost or hidden

sentences.english: The Audio Visual Resource Center provides a variety of multimedia materials for students and faculty.
sentences.chinese: 音频视觉资源中心为学生和教职工提供各种多媒体资料。

sentences.english: We visited the Audio Visual Resource Center to prepare for our presentation.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了音频视觉资源中心，为我们的演示做准备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 名词：音频视觉资源中心
detailed_translations.english: a center that provides audiovisual materials and equipment for educational or informational purposes

sentences.english: I decided to reprint the document because the original copy was damaged.
sentences.chinese: 我决定重新打印这份文件，因为原件已经损坏了。

sentences.english: The publisher will reprint the out-of-print book to meet the demand of readers.
sentences.chinese: 出版社将重新印刷这本绝版的书籍以满足读者的需求。

sentences.english: She reprinted the article from the magazine for her blog.
sentences.chinese: 她从杂志上重新打印了这篇文章用于她的博客。

detailed_translations.english: to produce new copies of something that has already been published or printed

sentences.english: The university archives contain historical records dating back to the founding of the institution.
sentences.chinese: 大学的档案包含着追溯到该机构成立的历史记录。

sentences.english: We need to digitize the archives to make them more accessible to researchers.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要将档案数字化，以便研究人员更容易访问。

detailed_translations.english: officially kept records of past events, activities, etc.

sentences.english: the volume of trade
sentences.chinese: 贸易量

detailed_translations.chinese: 卷， 册； 体积； 音量
detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

sentences.english: The bound volume of this journal contains research articles from multiple authors.
sentences.chinese: 这本期刊的合订本包含了多位作者的研究文章。

sentences.english: They decided to bind the volume of letters into a book for preservation.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定将这些信件装订成一本书以供保存。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合订本；装订成一册的书籍或文件
detailed_translations.english: a collection of issues of a periodical bound together as a book

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要， 提炼； 抽象化

sentences.english: The microform of this ancient manuscript helps preserve its content for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 这份古文书的微缩胶卷有助于将其内容保存给后代。

sentences.english: Researchers often use microforms to access historical documents that are too fragile to handle physically.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员经常使用微缩胶卷来访问那些物理上无法处理的历史文献。

detailed_translations.english: a small, flat copy of a book, document, or photograph that can be seen only with a microscope or magnifying glass

sentences.english: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.english: She borrowed a book from the library.
sentences.chinese: 她从图书馆借了一本书。

sentences.english: We borrowed a car to go on our trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们借了一辆车去旅行。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else, in order to use it for a short time and return it later

sentences.english: Can you lend me your pen for a moment?
sentences.chinese: 你能借我用一下你的笔吗？

sentences.english: She kindly lent us a helping hand with the project.
sentences.chinese: 她很乐意在项目中帮我们一把。

sentences.english: The museum lends an air of grandeur to the city.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆给城市增添了一种庄严的氛围。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone for temporary use
to have a tendency to do or be something; to contribute to a particular outcome

sentences.english: I had to take out a loan to buy my car.
sentences.chinese: 我只得贷款买车。

sentences.english: It’ll be years before we’ve paid off the loan.
sentences.chinese: 我们要过好几年才能还清贷款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

sentences.english: I read the newspaper every morning to stay informed about current events.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早上都读报纸，以了解时事。

sentences.english: The newspaper published an exclusive interview with the president.
sentences.chinese: 报纸发表了对总统的独家采访。

detailed_translations.english: a periodical publication consisting of news and articles of interest or opinion

sentences.english: the British Medical Journal
sentences.chinese: 《英国医学杂志》

detailed_translations.chinese: 杂志； 日报； 日志
detailed_translations.english: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

sentences.english: She made periodical visits to her dentist.
sentences.chinese: 她定期去看牙医。

detailed_translations.english: Periodical events or situations happen occasionally, at fairly regular intervals
a magazine, especially one about a serious or technical subject

sentences.english: people in the over-45 age category
sentences.chinese: 属45岁以上年龄组的人

sentences.english: Seats are available in eight of the ten price categories .
sentences.chinese: 座位共有10种票价，现有8种可售。

sentences.english: Williams’ style does not fit easily into the category of jazz.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯的风格不能轻易归入爵士乐的范畴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 种类； 类别； 范畴
detailed_translations.english: a group of people or things that are all of the same type
